tika-s0305t:6_2: Avijjā hi aññāṇalakkhaṇā sammuyhanākārena ārammaṇe pavattatīti sampayuttadhammānampi tadākārānuvidhānatāya paccayo hoti.
tika-s0305t:6_3: Tathā hi te aniccāsubhadukkhānattasabhāvepi dhamme niccādito gaṇhanti,
tika-s0305t:6_5: Yaṃ pana mohena abhibhūto pāpakiriyāya ādīnavaṃ apassanto pāṇaṃ hanati,
tika-s0305t:6_10: ayamassa sahajātavasena ca upanissayavasena ca pubbaṅgamatā.
tika-s0305t:6_14: Sā panesā vuttākārena akusalānaṃ pubbaṅgamabhūtā avijjā uppajjatīti sambandho.
tika-s0305t:6_15: Yadetanti yaṃ etaṃ pāpājigucchanatāya pāpato alajjanākārasaṇṭhitaṃ ahirikaṃ,
tika-s0305t:6_20: Ettha avijjāya vuttanayānusārena tappaṭipakkhato ca attho veditabbo.
tika-s0305t:6_22: tattha yathā akusalakammapathavasena pavattiyaṃ pubbaṅgamatā avijjāya,
tika-s0305t:6_23: evaṃ kusalakammapathavasena puññakiriyavatthuvasena ca pavattiyaṃ vijjāya pubbaṅgamatā vattabbā.
tika-s0305t:6_24: Vīmaṃsādhipativasena pavattiyaṃ ādhipaccākāravasena ca pubbaṅgamatā veditabbā.
tika-s0305t:6_25: Dvīhevāti ca avadhāraṇaṃ ādhipaccākārassa sahajāteneva saṅgahetabbato.
tika-s0305t:7_7: Sammādiṭṭhi pahotīti ettha sā vijjā sammādiṭṭhi veditabbā.
tika-s0305t:7_8: Na ekato sabbāni labbhanti sammāvācākammantājīvānaṃ pubbābhisaṅkhārassa anekarūpattā.
tika-s0305t:7_9: Lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe ekato labbhanti kiccato bhinnānampi tāsaṃ tattha sarūpato abhinnattā.
tika-s0305t:7_10: Ekā eva hi virati maggakkhaṇe tissannampi viratīnaṃ kiccaṃ sādhentī pavattati,
tika-s0305t:7_11: yathā ekā eva sammādiṭṭhi parijānanādivasena catubbidhakiccaṃ sādhentī pavattati.
tika-s0305t:7_12: Tāni ca kho sabbāni aṭṭhapi paṭhamajjhānike magge labbhantīti yojanā.
tika-s0305t:8_1: Yasmā mahāsaḷāyatanasutte vuttaṃ “sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ eva aṅgānaṃ vasenā”ti,
tika-s0305t:8_3: “Pubbeva kho panā”ti hi vacanaṃ tadā maggakkhaṇe viratīnaṃ abhāvaṃ ñāpeti,
tika-s0305t:8_4: tasmā kāmāvacaracittesu viya lokuttaracittesu virati aniyatāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0305t:9_0: Yadi evaṃ kasmā abhidhamme maggavibhaṅge pañcaṅgikavāro āgatoti āha “yampi abhidhamme”tiādi.
tika-s0305t:9_2: “Ekaṃ kiccantaraṃ dassetuṃ vutta”nti vatvā taṃ dassetuṃ “yasmiñhi kāle”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:9_5: Viratiuppādanena micchāvācādīni puggalena maggasamaye pajahāpentīti sammādiṭṭhiādīni “pañca kārakaṅgānī”ti vuttāni.
tika-s0305t:10_0: Sammākammanto pūratīti imehi sammādiṭṭhiādīhi sammākammantakiccaṃ pūrati nāma tehi vīriyādikehi tadatthasiddhito.
tika-s0305t:10_2: Imaṃ kiccantaraṃ dassetunti lokuttaramaggakkhaṇepi imāneva pañca sammāvācādiviratittayassa ekakkhaṇe kārāpakaṅgānīti dassetuṃ.
tika-s0305t:10_3: Evaṃ vuttanti “tasmiṃ samaye pañcaṅgiko maggo hotī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:10_12: tappaccayā akusalā ca dasāti vīsati akusalapakkhiyā,
tika-s0305t:10_14: tappaccayā kusalā ca dasāti vīsati kusalapakkhiyā mahācattārīsakasutte vuttā.
tika-s0305t:11_0: Yasmā kosalasaṃyuttepi idha ca therena “upaḍḍhamidaṃ, bhante,
tika-s0305t:11_1: brahmacariyassā”tiādinā vuttaṃ “mā hevaṃ ānandā”tiādinā paṭikkhipitvā “sakalamevidaṃ ānandā”tiādinā bhagavatā desitaṃ suttaṃ āgataṃ.
tika-s0305t:14_3: taṃ pana dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ tatthapi dhammasenāpatino eva savisesaṃ matthakaṃ pattaṃ,
tika-s0305t:14_7: Tasmā tassa matthakappattiyā maggabrahmacariye ijjhante tassa ekadeso idha ijjhati,
tika-s0305t:14_13: taṃ pana bhaṇḍāgāriko nāññāsi ñāṇassa sāvakavisayepi sappadesikattā,
tika-s0305t:14_14: dhammasenāpati pana ñāṇassa tattha nippadesikattā aññāsīti. Tenāha –
tika-s0305t:18_1: Ekavāraṃ nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karotīti idaṃ tasmiṃ ṭhānantare ṭhitena kātabbaṃ cārittaṃ.
tika-s0305t:18_2: Nagarato na pakkantāti nagarato bahi na gatā.
tika-s0305t:19_4: Rāgaṃ vinayamānā pariyosāpetīti sabbampi rāgaṃ samucchedavinayavasena vineti,
tika-s0305t:19_6: Kiccapariyosāpaneneva hi sayampi pariyosānaṃ nipphattiṃ upagacchati.
tika-s0305t:20_4: evaṃ kiriyāvasena laddhabalena tatramajjhattatāyuge thiraṃ dhāreti,
tika-s0305t:20_6: Hiriggahaṇena cettha taṃsahacaraṇato ottappampi gahitaṃyeva hoti.
tika-s0305t:20_8: Nāḷiyā minamāno puriso viya ārammaṇaṃ minātīti mano.
tika-s0305t:20_12: Lokiyavipassanācittaṃ atirekapaññāsa kusaladhamme ekābaddhe ekasaṅgahite karotīti sambandho.
tika-s0305t:20_14: avikkhepo hotī”ti cittaṅgavasena dhammasaṅgahe āgatanayeneva veditabbā.
tika-s0305t:20_16: Atirekasaṭṭhīti te eva sammākammantājīvehi anaññātaññassāmītindriyādīhi ca saddhiṃ atirekasaṭṭhi kusaladhamme.
tika-s0305t:21_0: Ariyapuggalassa nibbānaṃ paṭimukhaṃ sampāpane ratho viyāti ratho.
tika-s0305t:21_6: Vipassanāsampayuttānanti lokiyāya lokuttarāya ca vipassanāya sampayuttānaṃ.
tika-s0305t:21_13: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana byañjanaṃ anādiyitvā dhurasamādhisaddānaṃ bhinnādhikaraṇatā vuttā.
tika-s0305t:22_9: Na naṃ te vijjhantīti vacanapathā na naṃ vijjhanti.
tika-s0305t:22_11: tassa ariyamaggassa rathassa sammā yojitassa antarā bhaṅgo natthīti attho.
tika-s0305t:23_0: Attano purisakāraṃ nissāya laddhattā attano santāneti adhippāyo.
tika-s0305t:23_4: Dhitisampannatāya dhīrā paṇḍitapurisā lokamhā niyyanti gacchanti.
tika-s0305t:23_5: “Jayaṃ jaya”nti gāthāyaṃ vacanavipallāsena vuttanti āha “jinantā jinantā”ti.
tika-s0305t:26_3: aññaṃ maggaṃ paṭikkhipati ito aññassa niyyānikamaggassa abhāvato.
tika-s0305t:26_5: Ariyamagge gahite tassa pubbabhāgamaggo vipassanāya gahito evāti “missakamaggo kathito”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:26_7: Ayaṃ pana viseso “rāgakkhayo”tiādīhi yadipi nibbānaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:29_1: Rāgavinayādipadehi nibbānaṃ vāpi vucceyya arahattaṃ vāpi.
tika-s0305t:29_3: tasmā bhagavā tassa ajjhāsayavasena “nibbānadhātuyā kho eta”ntiādinā nibbānadhātuṃ vissajjetvā puna “āsavānaṃ khayo tena vuccatī”ti āha.
tika-s0305t:29_8: Anusandhikusalatāya pucchanto etaṃ avocāti iminā “pucchānusandhi idha labbhatī”ti dīpitaṃ,
tika-s0305t:32_1: Ekena pariyāyena aṭṭhaṅgikamaggaṃ vibhajitvāti “sammādiṭṭhī”tiādinā ekena pariyāyena ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ vibhāgena dassetvā “katamā ca,
tika-s0305t:32_4: Uggahadhāraṇaparicayañāṇānipi savanañāṇe eva avarodhaṃ gacchantīti “savanasammasanapaṭivedhapaccavekkhaṇavasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:33_2: Iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpanti nirodhamaggesu ninnabhāvaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0305t:33_4: tanninnabhāvo eva ca tattha kammakaraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:33_6: so eva abhimukhabhāvo tesaṃ samāgamoti ekābhisamayo.
tika-s0305t:34_2: Ettha ca keci “lokiyañāṇampi paṭivedho sabbassa yāthāvabodhabhāvato”ti vadanti.
tika-s0305t:34_4: na ca so lokuttaroti? Taṃ na,
tika-s0305t:34_7: paṭivedhanimittattā vā uggahādivasena pavattaṃ dukkhādīsu pubbabhāge ñāṇaṃ “paṭivedho”ti vuccati,
tika-s0305t:34_9: paṭivedhabhūtameva pana ñāṇaṃ ujukaṃ paṭivedhoti vattabbataṃ arahati.
tika-s0305t:35_0: Duddasattāti anadhigatañāṇena yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇato daṭṭhuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā uppattito pākaṭānipi.
tika-s0305t:35_5: Tassa mahantatarassa icchitabbataṃ dukkarataratañca upamāhi dasseti “bhavaggaggahaṇattha”ntiādinā.
tika-s0305t:35_6: Yathā purimaṃ saccadvayaṃ viya kenaci pariyāyena apākaṭatāya paramagambhīrattā uggahādivasena pubbabhāge
tika-s0305t:35_7: pavattibhedaṃ gahetvā “dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādinā catubbidhaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:35_8: Ekameva taṃ ñāṇaṃ hoti ekābhisamayavaseneva pavattanato.
tika-s0305t:36_2: Kāmaṃ sammasantassāti duvidhampi kāmaṃ aniccādito sammasantassa.
tika-s0305t:36_9: So eva ca nesaṃ anto samucchedaviveketi katvā tasmiṃ sādhetabbe uppannoti vuttaṃ “kāmavivittante uppanno”ti.
tika-s0305t:36_12: Imasmiñca nekkhammasaṅkappassa saddatthavibhāvena yathāvutto kāmapaccanīkaṭṭhādiko atthaniddhāraṇaviseso antogadho.
tika-s0305t:37_0: Eseva nayoti iminā byāpādapaccanīkaṭṭhena vihiṃsāya paccanīkaṭṭhenātiādikaṃ abyāpādāvihiṃsāsaṅkappānaṃ atthuddhāraṇavidhiṃ atidisati.
tika-s0305t:38_1: Pabbajitānaṃ micchājīvo nāma āhāranimittakoti āha “khādanīyabhojanīyādīnaṃ atthāyā”ti.
tika-s0305t:38_2: Sabbaso anesanāya pahānaṃ sammāājīvoti āha “buddhappasatthena ājīvenā”ti.
tika-s0305t:38_4: Akammapathapattāya hi anesanāya so padaghātaṃ karotiyeva.
tika-s0305t:39_0: Tathārūpe vā ārammaṇeti yasmiṃ ārammaṇe imassa pubbe kilesā na uppannā,
tika-s0305t:39_5: Vīriyameva pana anuppannākusalānuppādane labbhamānachandatāya dhurasampaggahatāya chandapariyāyena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:39_8: Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā cittaṃ paggahitaṃ karoti.
tika-s0305t:40_1: Catūsu ṭhānesu kiccasādhanavasenāti yathāvuttesu catūsu ṭhānesu padhānakiccassa nipphādanavasena anuppādanādivasena.
tika-s0305t:41_2: Ettha kathanti yadi rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānato paṭṭhāya yāva sabbabhavaggā jhānaṅgamaggaṅgabojjhaṅgānaṃ sadisatā,
tika-s0305t:41_4: tañca lokuttara”nti ettha kathaṃ attho gahetabboti āha “etthāpī”tiādi.
tika-s0305t:41_5: Taṃjhānikāvāti paṭhamajjhānādīsu yaṃ jhānaṃ maggapaṭilābhassa pādakabhūtaṃ,
tika-s0305t:41_6: taṃjhānikāva assa ariyassa uparipi tayo maggā.
tika-s0305t:41_12: tato dutiyādipādakajjhānato uppannassa saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇassa pādakajjhānātikkantānaṃ aṅgānaṃ asamāpajjitukāmatāvirāgabhāvato
tika-s0305t:41_13: itarassa ca atabbhāvato tīsupi vādesu vipassanāva niyametīti veditabbo,
tika-s0305t:41_14: tasmā vipassanāniyameneva hi paṭhamavādepi apādakajjhānādipādakāpi maggā paṭhamajjhānikā honti.
tika-s0305t:41_19: na somanassasahagatā upekkhāsahagatā hutvā jhānaṅgādiniyamaṃ maggassa karotīti evaṃ vipassanāniyamo vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-s0305t:41_20: Imasmiñca vāde pādakasammasitajjhānupanissayasabbhāve ajjhāsayo ekantena hotīti “puggalajjhāsayo niyametīti vadantī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0305t:41_21: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana visuddhimaggassa etissā aṭṭhakathāya ekasaṅgahitattā “tesaṃ vādavinicchayo…pe…
tika-s0305t:44_2: So hi nikantakasadiso paṭimukhagataṃ hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā bhindati,
tika-s0305t:44_3: tasmā bhedaṃ icchantena uddhaggaṃ katvā ṭhapitaṃ sammāpaṇihitaṃ nāma,
tika-s0305t:44_7: taṃ pana kammaṃ issarassa icchāvasena brahmā nimminātī”tiādinā micchāpakappanaṃ.
tika-s0305t:44_15: Tañhi ñāṇaṃ maggassa mūlakāraṇaṃ magge siddhe tassa kiccassa matthakappattito.
tika-s0305t:44_16: “Sammāpaṇihitāya diṭṭhiyā sammāpaṇihitāya maggabhāvanāyā”ti vuttattā missakamaggo kathito.
tika-s0305t:51_2: Paṭisallīyitunti yathāvuttaṃ kālaṃ paṭi divase divase samāpattiyaṃ dhammacintāyaṃ cittaṃ nilīyituṃ.
tika-s0305t:52_2: Svāyaṃ sapadeso yasmā vedanāvaseneva pāḷiyaṃ āgato,
tika-s0305t:52_9: Vipassanāsammasanaṃ pana bhagavato visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ eva nipphannaṃ,
tika-s0305t:52_10: tasmā bhagavato aññabhūmikāpi vedanā aññabhūmikānaṃ sattānaṃ viruddhā uppajjatevāti vuttaṃ “yāva bhavaggā pavattā sukhā vedanā”ti.
tika-s0305t:52_11: Sabbākārenāti sarūpato samudayato atthaṅgamato assādāditoti sabbākārena.
tika-s0305t:53_4: Sā sā ca vihārasamāpattīti khandhavasena āyatanādivasena ca pavattitvā tesaṃ ekadesabhūtaṃ vedanaṃyeva
tika-s0305t:53_5: pariggahetvā taṃ sammasitvā anukkamena samāpannā jhānasamāpatti phalasamāpatti ca.
tika-s0305t:53_6: Phalasamāpatti hi tathā sammasitvā punappunaṃ samāpajjanavasena atthato abhinnāpi adhiṭṭhānabhūtadhammabhedena bhinnā viya vuccati,
tika-s0305t:53_7: yato catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassabhedā devasikaṃ vaḷañjanasamāpattiyo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttā.
tika-s0305t:53_9: vedanāvasena panettha abhiniveso kato vedanānubhāvena jātā.
tika-s0305t:53_12: Tathā hi bhagavā sakalampi aḍḍhamāsaṃ vedanāvaseneva sammasanaṃ pavatteti,
tika-s0305t:53_14: Tayidaṃ acchariyaṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ bhikkhū pavedento satthā –
tika-s0305t:54_4: byāpādavasena taṃtaṃmicchādassanavasena ca akusalā vedanā eva hoti.
tika-s0305t:54_5: Brahmalokādīsu uppajjitvā tattha niccā dhuvā bhavissāmāti evaṃ diṭṭhiṃ upanissāyāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:55_4: evaṃ tadaññesampi akusalakammānaṃ vasena sammādiṭṭhipaccayā akusalavedanāppavatti yathārahaṃ nīharitvā vattabbā.
tika-s0305t:55_5: Eseva nayoti iminā yathā micchādiṭṭhipaccayā sammādiṭṭhipaccayā ca kusalākusalavipākavedanā sahajātakoṭiyā
tika-s0305t:55_6: upanissayakoṭiyā ca vasena yathārahaṃ yojetvā dassitā,
tika-s0305t:55_7: evaṃ micchāsaṅkappapaccayādīsupi yathārahaṃ yojetvā dassetabbāti imamatthaṃ atidisati.
tika-s0305t:55_8: Chandapaccayāti ettha taṇhāchandasahito kattukāmatāchando adhippetoti āha “chandapaccayātiādīsu pana
tika-s0305t:55_10: Vitakkapaccayāti ettha appanāppattova vitakko adhippetoti vuttaṃ “vitakkapaccayā paṭhamajjhānavedanāvā”ti.
tika-s0305t:55_13: heṭṭhā tisso arūpāvacarā evaṃ sesā cha saññāsamāpattivedanā.
tika-s0305t:56_2: Tiṇṇañhi tesaṃ sahabhāvena paccayatā aṭṭhalobhasahagatacittesu eva.
tika-s0305t:56_6: Chandavitakkānaṃ vūpasame dutiyajjhānādivedanā adhippetā saññāya avūpasantattā.
tika-s0305t:56_7: Dutiyajjhānādivedanāgahaṇena hi sabbā saññāsamāpattiyo ca gahitāva honti.
tika-s0305t:56_8: Tiṇṇampi vūpasameti chandavitakkasaññānaṃ vūpasame nevasaññānāsaññāyatanavedanā adhippetā.
tika-s0305t:56_10: Heṭṭhā “sammādiṭṭhipaccayā”ti ettha sammādiṭṭhiggahaṇena heṭṭhimamaggasammādiṭṭhipi gahitāva hotīti āha –
tika-s0305t:56_12: Atha vā heṭṭhimamaggādhigamena vinā aggamaggo natthīti heṭṭhimamaggādhigamaṃ atthāpannaṃ katvā “arahattaphalassa pattatthāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:56_13: Āyameti phalena missito hoti etenāti āyāmo,
tika-s0305t:56_22: Catumaggasahajātāti etena “arahattaphalassa pattatthāyā”ti ettha heṭṭhimamaggānaṃ atthāpattivasena gahitabhāvameva joteti.
tika-s0305t:56_23: Keci pana “catumaggasahajātāti vatvā nibbattitalokuttaravedanāti bhūtakathanaṃ visesanaṃ.
tika-s0305t:59_1: Micchādiṭṭhi vūpasamati sabbaso pahīyati etenāti micchādiṭṭhivūpasamo.
tika-s0305t:59_3: Bhavantare uppajjanto atidūreti maññamāno vipākavedanaṃ na gaṇhātī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:59_4: “Iminā nayenā”ti atidisitvāpi tamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “yassa yassā”tiādiṃ vatvā eva sāmaññavasena
tika-s0305t:59_5: vuttamatthaṃ pacchimesu tīsu padesu sarūpatova dassetuṃ “chandavūpasamapaccayā”tiādimāha,
tika-s0305t:62_1: Tissannampi sikkhānaṃ sikkhanaṃ sīlaṃ etassāti sikkhanasīlo.
tika-s0305t:62_10: Maggakkhaṇe hi sikkhākiccaṃ na niṭṭhitaṃ vippakatabhāvato,
tika-s0305t:66_7: So eva taṃsamaṅgīnaṃ vaṭṭadukkhapātato dhāraṇaṭṭhena dhammoti āha –
tika-s0305t:66_9: Ñāṇassa micchāsabhāvo nāma natthīti viññāṇamevettha paccavekkhaṇavasena pavattaṃ ñāṇa-
tika-s0305t:66_11: Micchāpaccavekkhaṇoti kiñci pāpaṃ katvā “aho mayā kataṃ sukata”nti evaṃ pavatto micchāpaccavekkhaṇo.
tika-s0305t:66_12: Gosīlagovatādipūraṇaṃ muttīti evaṃ gaṇhato micchāvimutti nāma.
tika-s0305t:66_32: Sahajātavasena upanissayavasena ca sapaccayatā kiccasādhane nipphādane sahāyabhāvūpagamane ca saparivāratā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0305t:70_2: Ekantakāḷakattā cittassa apabhassarabhāvakaraṇato kaṇhābhijātihetuto ca vuttaṃ “kaṇhanti akusaladhamma”nti.
tika-s0305t:70_3: Vodānabhāvato cittassa pabhassarabhāvakaraṇato sukkābhijātihetuto ca vuttaṃ –
tika-s0305t:71_3: tena araṇīyato upagantabbato sāmaññattho nibbānanti āha –
tika-s0305t:71_6: Brahmaññatthanti etthāpi iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0305t:74_1: Aparāparaṃ parivattamānena vattasampannena saṃsāraddhānapariññāvaseneva nibbānassa pattabbattā vuttaṃ –
tika-s0305t:74_8: Tasmāti yasmā apariññeyyaparijānanakiccena nibbānassa pattiyā addhānapariññāsiddhi ñāyati,
tika-s0305t:74_9: tasmā upacāravasena nibbānaṃ “addhānapariññā”ti vuccati yathā “himasanti sūriyaṃ uggametī”ti.
tika-s0305t:74_14: Yāthāvato jānanato paccakkhato dassanato ca ñāṇadassananti idha phalanibbānapaccavekkhaṇā adhippetāti āha –
tika-s0305t:77_2: evaṃ kalyāṇamittatā ariyamaggapātubhāvassāti sadisūpamā aruṇuggaṃ kalyāṇamittatāya.
tika-s0305t:77_4: ariyamaggo vā daṭṭhabbo sūriyapātubhāvo viya tena vidhūpanīyandhakāravidhamanato.
tika-s0305t:80_1: Tathā tathā vutte bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena kathito,
tika-s0305t:84_2: ime kusalā dhammā uppādetabbā”ti vuttavajjetabbavajjanasampādetabbasampādanavasena pavatto appamādo.
tika-s0305t:90_1: Vassikāya pupphaṃ vassikaṃ yathā “āmalakiyā phalaṃ āmalaka”nti.
tika-s0305t:90_3: “Yāni kānicī”ti padehi itarāni samānādhikaraṇāni bhavituṃ yuttānīti “paccatte sāmivacana”nti vatvā tathā vibhattivipariṇāmo kato.
tika-s0305t:90_4: “Tantāvutāna”nti padaṃ niddhāraṇe sāmivacananti tattha “vatthānī”ti vacanasesena atthaṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:95_2: Ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ magganti ettha nānantariyakatāya vipassanāpi gahitā eva hotīti vuttaṃ “sahavipassana”nti.
tika-s0305t:99_2: Taṃ pana nāgānaṃ balappatti evāti āha –
tika-s0305t:99_5: Nāgā kāyaṃ vaḍḍhentītiādi yasmā ca bhagavatā upamāvasena ābhataṃ,
tika-s0305t:99_6: tasmā evameva khoti etthātiādinā upamaṃ saṃsandati.
tika-s0305t:101_1: Na patiāvamatīti ca nikujjitabhāvena udakavamano ghaṭo,
tika-s0305t:103_1: Tenetaṃ vuttanti tena ariyamaggassa ijjhanena etesaṃ sabbesaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ ijjhanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:107_1: Sahavipassanassa ariyamaggassa bhāvanāya ijjhanena etaṃ abhiññāpariññeyyādidhammānaṃ abhiññāparijānanādīnaṃ
tika-s0305t:107_2: ijjhanaṃ vuttaṃ khattiyādīnaṃ visayaādikaṃ karontassa kathāya sajjitattā.
tika-s0305t:111_2: Kilesakāmopi hi kāmitanti parikappitena vidhinā ca adhikarāgehi esanīyo.
tika-s0305t:117_2: Rūpārūpabhaveti rūpabhave ca arūpabhave ca rūpārūpataṇhopanissayā rūpārūpāvacarakammanibbattā khandhā.
tika-s0305t:119_4: Ghaṭanapabandhanakilesoti hetunā phalassa kammavaṭṭassa vipākavaṭṭena dukkhappabandhasaññitassa ghaṭanassa sambajjhanassa nibbattakakileso.
tika-s0305t:122_2: Thāmagatanti ca aññehi asādhāraṇo kāmarāgādīnaṃyeva āveṇiko sabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0305t:122_4: So sati paccayalābhe uppajjanārahatāya santāne anusetīti anusayo.
tika-s0305t:122_7: Tattha pavattiyā paccayabhāvato orambhāgiyāni yathā “pacchiyo goduhako”ti.
tika-s0305t:122_11: tassa hitānīti sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā na vuttanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0305t:131_0: Vuttesu pakāresu idha avuttānaṃ vasena veditabbo.
tika-s0305t:131_1: Kilesasantānaniddāya uṭṭhahatīti etena sikhāpattavipassanāsahagatānampi satiādīnaṃ bojjhaṅgabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0305t:131_3: Sattahi bojjhaṅgehi bhāvitehi saccapaṭivedho hotīti kathamidaṃ jānitabbanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “yathāhā”tiādi.
tika-s0305t:131_4: Jhānaṅgamaggaṅgādayo viyāti etena bodhibojjhaṅgasaddānaṃ samudāyāvayavavisayataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0305t:131_5: Senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viyāti etena puggalapaññattiyā avijjamānapaññattibhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0305t:132_2: bodhiyā eva aṅgāti bojjhaṅgāti vuttaṃ “bujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā”ti.
tika-s0305t:132_3: Vipassanādīnaṃ kāraṇānaṃ bujjhitabbānaṃ saccānaṃ anurūpaṃ paccakkhabhāvena paṭimukhaṃ aviparītaṃ sammā
tika-s0305t:132_4: bujjhantīti evaṃ vatthuvisesadīpakehi uparimaggehi anubujjhantītiādinā vuttabodhisaddehi nippadesena
tika-s0305t:133_2: Punadeva sundaro ca atthopīti āha “pasattho sundaro ca bojjhaṅgo”ti.
tika-s0305t:133_4: “Eke vaṇṇayantī”ti vatvā tattha yathāvuttavivekattayato aññaṃ vivekadvayaṃ uddharitvā dassetuṃ “te hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:133_8: Tattha tattha nicchayatāya kasiṇajjhānaggahaṇena anuppādānampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:136_2: Kammautucittāhārasaññito catubbidho paccayo ṭhiti etassāti paccayaṭṭhitiko.
tika-s0305t:136_6: Tena kāraṇena pavattanakassa aññassa kāmacchandassa nimittattā subhanimittanti.
tika-s0305t:136_9: iṭṭhākārena vā gayhamānaṃ rūpādiārammaṇampi subhanimittaṃ vuttākārena.
tika-s0305t:136_12: Tasminti yathāniddhārite kāmacchandabhūte tadārammaṇabhūte ca duvidhepi subhanimitte.
tika-s0305t:136_16: saddena kāmacchandanīvaraṇassa āhāradassanapāḷi uttānāti katvā vuttaṃ –
tika-s0305t:137_0: Paṭighopi paṭighanimittaṃ purimuppannassa pacchā uppajjanakassa nimittabhāvato.
tika-s0305t:138_12: Iti sabbehipi imehi padehi kilesavasena kāyālasiyaṃ kathitaṃ.
tika-s0305t:139_7: Paṇamanāti yathā hi tantato uṭṭhitapesakāro kiñcideva upariṭṭhitaṃ gahetvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ ussāpeti,
tika-s0305t:139_10: Iti sabbehipi imehi padehi kilesavasena kāyaphandanameva kathitaṃ.
tika-s0305t:140_6: Kucchipūraṃ bhuttavato hi pariḷāhuppattiyā upahatindriyo viya hoti,
tika-s0305t:141_7: Iriyāpathikampi cittaṃ yassa vasena iriyāpathaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkonto olīyati,
tika-s0305t:142_0: Cetaso avūpasamoti cittassa avūpasantatā asannisinnabhāvo. Tenāha –
tika-s0305t:142_2: Atthato panetanti svāyaṃ avūpasantākāro vikkhepasabhāvattā vikkhepahetutāya ca atthato etaṃ uddhaccakukkuccameva.
tika-s0305t:143_0: Vicikicchāya ārammaṇadhammā nāma “buddhe kaṅkhatī”tiādinā āgataaṭṭhakaṅkhāvatthubhūtā dhammā.
tika-s0305t:143_1: Yasmā vicikicchā byāpādādayo viya anu anu uggahaṇapaccayā uppajjati,
tika-s0305t:143_3: Yasmā purimuppannā vicikicchā pacchā vicikicchāya paccayo hoti,
tika-s0305t:143_8: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ārammaṇassapi tattha visesapaccayataṃ upādāya “kāmacchando vicikicchāti ime dve dhammā ārammaṇena kathitā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:143_10: tathāpi yathā “paṭighampi paṭighanimitta”nti katvā “byāpādo upanissayena kathito”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0305t:143_11: evaṃ subhampi subhanimittanti katvā kāmacchando upanissayena kathitoti sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-s0305t:143_15: Ubhayesampi upanissayakoṭiyā paccayabhāve vattabbameva natthīti āha “sahajātena ca upanissayena cā”ti.
tika-s0305t:144_0: Yasmā sati nāma “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādinā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anussaraṇavasena vattati,
tika-s0305t:144_2: Lokuttaradhamme ca anussavādivasena gahetvā tathā pavattateva.
tika-s0305t:145_3: Padadvayena paccayato sabhāvato kiccato phalato kusaladhammaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0305t:146_0: Kusalakiriyāya ādikammabhāvena pavattavīriyaṃ dhitisabhāvatāya dhātūti vuttanti āha “ārambhadhātūti paṭhamārambhavīriya”nti.
tika-s0305t:146_1: Laddhāsevanaṃ vīriyaṃ balappattaṃ hutvā paṭipakkhaṃ vidhamatīti āha –
tika-s0305t:146_3: Adhimattādhimattatarānaṃ paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ vidhamanasamatthaṃ paṭupaṭutarādibhāvappattaṃ hotīti āha –
tika-s0305t:146_4: “parakkamadhātūti paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanatāya tatopi balavatara”nti.
tika-s0305t:147_3: Yasmā aparāparuppattiyā pītipi tathā vattabbataṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ visuddhimagge “pītiyā eva taṃ nāma”nti.
tika-s0305t:147_6: kāyapassaddhiyā vedanādikhandhattayassa viya rūpakāyassapi passambhanaṃ hoti,
tika-s0305t:147_8: tato evettha bhagavatā lahutādīnaṃ viya duvidhatā vuttā.
tika-s0305t:147_9: Tathā samāhitākāraṃ sallakkhetvā gayhamāno samathova samathanimittaṃ,
tika-s0305t:147_12: Tathā hi so anavaṭṭhānaraso bhantatāpaccupaṭṭhāno vutto.
tika-s0305t:147_14: so eva nimittanti pubbe viya vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:148_0: Yo ārammaṇe iṭṭhāniṭṭhākāraṃ anādiyitvā gahetabbo majjhattākāro,
tika-s0305t:148_1: yo ca pubbe upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāvasena uppanno majjhattākāro,
tika-s0305t:148_2: duvidhopi so upekkhāya ārammaṇadhammoti adhippetoti āha –
tika-s0305t:151_1: Khīṇāsavassa lokuttaraṃ sīlaṃ nāma maggaphalapariyāpannā sammāvācākammantājīvā sīlalakkhaṇappattā tadaññe cetanādayo.
tika-s0305t:151_3: vārittasīlassa pana sambhavo eva natthi viramaṇavasena pavattiyā abhāvato.
tika-s0305t:152_1: Lakkhaṇassa dassananti sabhāvadhammānaṃ saṅkhatānaṃ paccattalakkhaṇassa ñātapariññāya,
tika-s0305t:152_3: Pajahantopi hi te pahātabbākārato passati nāma.
tika-s0305t:152_9: Pañhapayirupāsananti pañhapucchanavasena payirupāsanaṃ aññakammatthāya upasaṅkamanassa kevalaṃ upasaṅkamaneneva jotitattā.
tika-s0305t:153_2: Aññesaṃyeva santiketi ariyehi aññesaṃ sāsanikānaṃyeva santike. Tenāha –
tika-s0305t:153_5: Tattha hi pabbajjā ariyānaṃ anupabbajjā nāma na hotīti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:155_0: Saratīti taṃ ovādānusāsanidhammaṃ cinteti citte karoti.
tika-s0305t:155_1: Vitakkāhataṃ karotīti punappunaṃ parivitakkanena tadatthaṃ vitakkanipphāditaṃ karoti.
tika-s0305t:155_3: Taṃ pana sampādanaṃ pāripūri evāti āha “paripuṇṇo hotī”ti.
tika-s0305t:155_6: Tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānanti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ovādadhamme āgatānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ.
tika-s0305t:155_8: Pavicinatīti “idaṃ rūpaṃ ettakaṃ rūpa”ntiādinā vicayaṃ āpajjati.
tika-s0305t:155_9: Ñāṇañca ropetīti “aniccaṃ calaṃ palokaṃ pabhaṅgū”tiādinā ñāṇaṃ pavatteti.
tika-s0305t:155_11: āpajjatīti rūpasattakārūpasattakakkamena vipassanaṃ paccakkhato viya aniccatādīnaṃ dassanaṃ sammasanaṃ āpajjati.
tika-s0305t:156_4: Samīpatthe hi idaṃ bhummanti āha “maraṇassa āsannakāle”ti.
tika-s0305t:158_0: Avihādīsu vattamānopi ekaṃsato uddhaṃgamanāraho puggalo akaniṭṭhagāmī eva nāmāti vuttaṃ “eko uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti pañca hontī”ti.
tika-s0305t:158_3: tathāpi tattha bhūmīsu āyuṃ aggahetvā akaniṭṭhabhave āyuvaseneva soḷasakappasahassāyukatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0305t:158_4: “Satta phalā sattānisaṃsā pāṭikaṅkhā”ti vuttattā “arahattamaggassa pubbabhāgavipassanā bojjhaṅgā kathitā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:158_5: Sattannampi sahabhāvo labbhatīti “apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekacittakkhaṇikā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:158_6: Tayidaṃ pāḷiyaṃ tattha tattha “tasmiṃ samaye”ti āgatavacanena viññāyati,
tika-s0305t:161_1: “Satisambojjhaṅgo”ti evaṃ ce mayhaṃ hotīti satisambojjhaṅgo nāma seṭṭho uttamo pavaro,
tika-s0305t:161_2: tasmāhaṃ satisambojjhaṅgasīsena phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā viharissāmīti evaṃ ce mayhaṃ pubbabhāge hotīti attho.
tika-s0305t:161_4: sabbaso pamāṇakarakilesābhāvato appamāṇadhammārammaṇato ca appamāṇoti evaṃ mayhaṃ antosamāpattiyaṃ asammohavasena hoti.
tika-s0305t:161_5: Suparipuṇṇoti bhāvanāpāripūriyā suṭṭhu paripuṇṇoti evaṃ mayhaṃ antosamāpattiyaṃ asammohavasena hotīti.
tika-s0305t:161_6: Tiṭṭhatīti yathākālaparicchedasamāpattiyā avaṭṭhānena tappariyāpannatāya satisambojjhaṅgo tiṭṭhati paṭibandhavasena.
tika-s0305t:161_9: Anuppādanti nibbānaṃ uppādābhāvato uppādavantehi ca vinissaṭattā.
tika-s0305t:161_16: Āvajjitattā āvajjitakālato paṭṭhāya ārabbha pavattiyā satisambojjhaṅgo tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0305t:161_19: Aṭṭhahākārehīti uppādāvajjanādīhi ceva anuppādāvajjanādīhi ca vuttākāraviparītehi aṭṭhahi ākārehi cavantaṃ
tika-s0305t:161_20: samāpattivasena anavaṭṭhānatopi gacchantaṃ cavatīti thero pajānātīti.
tika-s0305t:162_1: Kiṃ pana te visuṃ visuṃ pavattantīti āha “yadā hī”tiādi.
tika-s0305t:162_4: Tañca kho tathā katvā dhammaṃ paccavekkhaṇavasena.
tika-s0305t:165_2: taṃ pana kissa kenāti pucchanto “kiṃ bujjhanatthāyā”ti vatvā taṃ dassento “maggenā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t:165_5: paṭhamavikappe sacchikiriyābhisamayo eva dassitoti tena atuṭṭhe “maggena vā”ti dutiyavikappamāha.
tika-s0305t:165_6: Vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitanti padehi sabbaṃ maggakiccaṃ tassa phalañca dassitaṃ.
tika-s0305t:165_9: Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hotītiādinā paccavekkhaṇā dassitā.
tika-s0305t:168_2: Parisaṃ ogāḷho hutvā caratīti parisāvacaroti āha –
tika-s0305t:168_12: Itivādo hotīti evaṃ imassa upari vādāropanaṃ hoti.
tika-s0305t:168_14: Evaṃ vādappamokkhānisaṃsaṃ parehi āropitadosassa nibbeṭhanavasena dassetvā idāni dosapavedanavasena dassetuṃ “ayaṃ pucchāya doso”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:169_0: Ettakaṃ ṭhānantiādito paṭṭhāya yāva “tīṇi sucaritānī”ti ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0305t:169_4: Gocarajjhatte ṭhitaṃ hotīti kammaṭṭhānārammaṇe samādhānavasena ṭhitaṃ hoti avaṭṭhitaṃ.
tika-s0305t:169_9: Tasmiṃ amanāparūpadassane na maṅku vilakkho na hoti.
tika-s0305t:170_0: Imesu chasu dvāresu aṭṭhārasa duccaritāni honti paccekaṃ kāyavacīmanoduccaritabhedena.
tika-s0305t:170_3: Tena “aniṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate dosaṃ uppādentassā”tiādinā tividhaduccaritaṃ nīharitvā vattabbaṃ,
tika-s0305t:170_5: Manoduccaritādisāmaññena pana tīṇiyeva duccaritāni hontīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:171_0: Paññattivasenāti vatthuṃ anāmasitvā piṇḍagahaṇamukhena kevalaṃ paññattivaseneva.
tika-s0305t:171_6: Pariṇāmetīti parivatteti duccaritāni tattha anuppādetvā sucaritāni uppādento.
tika-s0305t:171_11: Ettāvatāti ādito paṭṭhāya yāva “tīṇi sucaritāni paripūrentī”ti padaṃ, ettāvatā.
tika-s0305t:171_12: Sīlānurakkhakaṃ indriyasaṃvarasīlanti catupārisuddhisīlassa anurakkhakaṃ indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ kathikaṃ.
tika-s0305t:171_13: Kathaṃ pana tadeva tassa anurakkhakaṃ hotīti?
tika-s0305t:172_8: satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrentī”ti.
tika-s0305t:172_11: Pubbabhāgāvāti ettha keci “pubbabhāgā cā”ti pāṭhaṃ katvā “pubbeva lokuttarā pubbabhāgā cā”ti atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-s0305t:172_14: bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiṃ paripūrentī”ti evaṃ vuttā bojjhaṅgā lokuttarāva vijjāvimuttisahagatabhāvato.
tika-s0305t:175_4: Kammaṭṭhānavimuttiyā suṭṭhu vimuttanti kammaṭṭhānamanasikārena nīvaraṇānaṃ dūrībhāvato tehi suṭṭhu vimuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:175_6: “Mahā vata me ayaṃ attho uppanno”ti atthiko hutvā.
tika-s0305t:177_0: 190. Tathāgatassa pātubhāvātiādinā buddhuppādakāle eva bojjhaṅgaratanapaṭilābhoti dasseti.
tika-s0305t:183_4: Eseva nayo pāḷito atthato ca catutthena pañcamachaṭṭhānaṃ samānattā.
tika-s0305t:187_1: Kittakena nu kho kāraṇena bujjhanakaaṅgā nāma vuccanti bujjhanakassa puggalassa aṅgāti vattabbataṃ labhanti.
tika-s0305t:187_2: Missakabojjhaṅgā kathitā sahavipassanā maggabojjhaṅgā kathitāti katvā.
tika-s0305t:187_3: Dhammaparicchedo kathito gaṇanāmattena paricchinditvā vuttattā na bhūmantaraparicchedo,
tika-s0305t:189_4: atha kho upanissayavasenapettha attho labbhatīti dasseti.
tika-s0305t:189_5: Paṭhamavaggassa hi dutiye sutte upanissayavaseneva attho dassito.
tika-s0305t:191_5: Nīvaraṇavigame sambhavato paccayato byāpādo vigato hotīti āha –
tika-s0305t:191_8: Yañhi taṇhāsahagataṃ asahagatampi taṇhaṃ upanissāya nipphannaṃ,
tika-s0305t:193_9: Te vā bojjhaṅge bhāvetvā ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ nāma phalacittaṃ,
tika-s0305t:193_11: Tampīti phalacittampi maggānantaratāya magganissitaṃ katvā missakameva kathetuṃ vaṭṭati “bodhāya saṃvattantī”ti vuttattā.
tika-s0305t:195_2: Pariniṭṭhapetvā gahaṇāti gilitvā viya pariniṭṭhapetvā gahaṇākārā.
tika-s0305t:197_4: Dhammo uppajjamāno ukkujjanto viya nirujjhamāno avakujjanto viya hotīti vuttaṃ “ukkujjaṃ vuccati udayo,
tika-s0305t:197_7: “Eso hi te udāyi maggo paṭiladdho, yo te…pe…
tika-s0305t:197_8: tathattāya upanessatī”ti pariyosāne bhagavato vacanañcettha sādhakaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:197_9: Tena tenākārena viharantanti yena sammasanākārena vipassanāvihārena viharantaṃ.
tika-s0305t:201_1: Na ca pabhāvantanti na ca pabhāsampannaṃ.
tika-s0305t:201_6: Uppajjituṃ appadānenāti ettha nanu lokiyakusalacittassapi suvisuddhassa uppajjituṃ appadānena upakkilesatāti?
tika-s0305t:201_12: Nīvaraṇe hi vūpasante santāne uppattiyā aparisuddhaṃ hoti,
tika-s0305t:201_15: apica nippariyāyato uppajjituṃ appadāneneva tesaṃ upakkilesatāti dassento “yadaggena hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t:201_17: Na āvarantīti kusaladhamme uppajjituṃ appadānavasena na āvaranti,
tika-s0305t:203_0: 219. Paññā dubbalā hoti, na balavatī paṭipakkhena upakkiliṭṭhabhāvato. Tenāha “mandā avisadā”ti.
tika-s0305t:204_2: Tassā tadā uppannākārasallakkhaṇena avijahanto punappunaṃ tassā nibbattanena.
tika-s0305t:204_4: Idaṃ sandhāyāti ettake divasepi na vinassanti,
tika-s0305t:204_5: sā dhammapīti laddhapaccayā hutvā visesāvahāti imamatthaṃ sandhāya etaṃ “imassa pañca nīvaraṇā tasmiṃ samaye na hontī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:212_3: Tathā tathā vidahanatoti “seyyohamasmī”tiādinā tena tenākārena vidahanato ṭhapanato,
tika-s0305t:214_4: Abbhuggatāyāti udīritā nibbattito tattha tattha gacchanato.
tika-s0305t:214_13: Buddhā ca kadāci karahaci uppajjanti cakkavattinopi yebhuyyena tasmiṃyeva uppajjanatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0305t:215_5: Vattabbataṃ āpajjati bhāvini bhūte viya upacāroti yathā –
tika-s0305t:215_7: Laddhanāmassāti cakkavattīti loke laddhasamaññassa patthanīyassa purisavisesassa.
tika-s0305t:215_11: tassa uppattiyā cakkaratanassa uppajjanato cakkavattīti evaṃ nāmaṃ uppajjati.
tika-s0305t:215_12: “Cakkaṃ vattessatī”ti idaṃ pana niyāmaṃ anapekkhitvā tassa uppajjatīti ratanānuppattiṃ gahetvā vuttanayato saññā uppajjati “cakkavattī”ti.
tika-s0305t:215_15: atha pacchā ratanāni pātubhavantīti bahūnaṃ pātubhāvaṃ upādāya bahulavacanatopi etaṃ “cakkavattissa pātubhāvā ratanānaṃ pātubhāvo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:215_18: Puññasambhāro bhinnasantānatāya ratanānampi pariyāyena upanissayahetūti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:216_5: Atidīghātirassatādiṃ chabbidhaṃ dosaṃ vivajjetvā ṭhitassāti vacanaseso.
tika-s0305t:217_0: Sabbesaṃ catubhūmakadhammānaṃ purecaraṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesanavasena pavattanato.
tika-s0305t:217_1: Buddhādīhipi appahānīyatāya mahantadhammasabhāvattā dhammakāye ca jeṭṭhakaṭṭhena dhammakāyūpapannaṃ.
tika-s0305t:217_5: Anādikālabhāvitassa kilesasantānassa khaṇeneva viddhaṃsanato sīghaṃ lahu javanti pariyāyā.
tika-s0305t:219_2: eḷena mūgo viyāti eḷamūgoti imamatthaṃ dassento “mukhena vāca”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0305t:223_5: Taṃ sabbattha satokārībhāvāvahattā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattati.
tika-s0305t:223_6: Yathā ca paccanīkadhammappahānaṃ anurūpadhammadesanā ca anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya hoti,
tika-s0305t:223_7: evaṃ satirahitapuggalavajjanā satokārīpuggalasevanā ca tattha ca yuttapayuttatā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya
tika-s0305t:224_4: Paripucchakatāti ācariyaṃ payirupāsitvā pañcapi nikāye sahaṭṭhakathāya pariyogāhetvā yaṃ yaṃ tattha gaṇṭhiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0305t:224_6: kathaṃ imassa ko attho”ti evaṃ khandhādīsu atthapucchakabhāvo.
tika-s0305t:225_0: Vatthuvisadakiriyāti cittacetasikānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato sarīraṃ tappaṭibaddhāni ca cīvarādīni idha “vatthūnī”ti adhippetāni,
tika-s0305t:225_5: Sedamalamakkhitanti sedena ceva jallikāsaṅkhātena sarīramalena ca makkhitaṃ. Ca-
tika-s0305t:225_6: saddena aññampi sarīrassa ca cittassa ca pīḷāvahaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0305t:225_13: Te hi cittuppādā cittekaggatāya ijjhantiyāpi aparisuddhabhāvāya saṃvattanti.
tika-s0305t:225_18: atha kho tasmiṃ aparisuddhe ñāṇampi aparisuddhaṃ hotīti nissayāparisuddhiyā nissitāparisuddhi viya visayassa
tika-s0305t:225_19: aparisuddhatāya visayīnaṃ aparisuddhiṃ dasseti anvayato byatirekato ca.
tika-s0305t:226_1: Yathāpaccayaṃ saddheyyavatthusmiṃ adhimokkhakiccassa paṭutarabhāvena paññāya avisadatāya vīriyādīnañca
tika-s0305t:226_4: Tatoti tasmā saddhindriyassa balavabhāvato itaresañca mandattā.
tika-s0305t:226_5: Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā sampayuttadhammānaṃ paggaṇhanaṃ anubalappadānaṃ paggaho,
tika-s0305t:226_12: Rūpagataṃ viya cakkhunā yena yāthāvato visayasabhāvaṃ passati,
tika-s0305t:226_13: taṃ dassanakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti balavatā saddhindriyena abhibhūtattā.
tika-s0305t:226_14: Sahajātadhammesu hi indaṭṭhaṃ karontānaṃ saha pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekarasatāvaseneva atthasiddhi,
tika-s0305t:227_0: Dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇenāti yassa saddheyyavatthuno uḷāratādiguṇe adhimuccanassa sātisayappavattiyā saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0305t:227_2: Evañhi evaṃdhammatānayena sabhāvasarasato pariggayhamāne savipphāro adhimokkho na hoti –
tika-s0305t:227_4: Dhuriyadhammesu hi yathā saddhāya balavabhāve paññāya mandabhāvo hoti,
tika-s0305t:227_5: evaṃ paññāya balavabhāve saddhāya mandabhāvo hoti.
tika-s0305t:227_9: Tathā amanasikaraṇenāti yenākārena bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0305t:227_11: Idha duvidhena saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo attano vā paccayavisesena kiccuttariyato vīriyādīnaṃ vā mandakiccatāya.
tika-s0305t:227_13: dutiyavikappe pana yathā manasikaroto vīriyādīnaṃ mandakiccatāya saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0305t:227_14: tathā amanasikārena vīriyādīnaṃ paṭutarabhāvāvahena manasikārena saddhindriyaṃ tehi samataṃ karontena hāpetabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:228_0: Vakkalittheravatthūti so hi āyasmā saddhādhimutto tattha ca katādhikāro satthu rūpakāyadassane pasuto eva hutvā viharanto satthārā – “kiṃ te, vakkali,
tika-s0305t:228_1: iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena, yo kho, vakkali,
tika-s0305t:228_3: so maṃ passatī”tiādinā ovadiyamāno kammaṭṭhāne niyojitopi taṃ ananuyuñjanto paṇāmito attānaṃ vinipātetuṃ papātaṭṭhānaṃ abhiruhi.
tika-s0305t:228_4: Atha naṃ satthā yathānisinnova obhāsavissajjanena attānaṃ dassetvā –
tika-s0305t:231_2: So tena vacanena amateneva abhisitto haṭṭhatuṭṭho hutvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi,
tika-s0305t:231_4: Taṃ ñatvā bhagavā indriyasamattapaṭipādanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā adāsi.
tika-s0305t:231_5: So satthārā dinnanayena vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
tika-s0305t:232_3: Hāpetabbanti yathā saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena hāyati,
tika-s0305t:232_4: evaṃ vīriyindriyassa adhimattatā passaddhiyādibhāvanāya hāyati samādhipakkhikattā tassā.
tika-s0305t:232_5: Tathā hi samādhindriyassa adhimattataṃ kosajjapātato rakkhantī vīriyādibhāvanā viya vīriyindriyassa adhimattataṃ
tika-s0305t:232_9: So hi āyasmāpi satthu santikā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sītavane viharanto –
tika-s0305t:232_11: na ca sakkā sukheneva sukhaṃ adhigantuṃ,
tika-s0305t:232_12: kāyaṃ kilametvāpi samaṇadhammo kātabbo”ti ṭhānacaṅkamanameva adhiṭṭhāya padhānamanuyuñjanto pādatalesu
tika-s0305t:232_13: phoṭesu uṭṭhitesupi vedanaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā daḷhavīriyaṃ karonto accāraddhavīriyatāya visesaṃ pavattetuṃ nāsakkhi.
tika-s0305t:232_14: Satthā tattha gantvā vīṇopamovādena ovaditvā vīriyasamatāyojanavidhiṃ dassento kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā gijjhakūṭaṃ gato.
tika-s0305t:232_15: Theropi satthārā dinnanayena vīriyasamataṃ yājetvā bhāvento vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahatteva patiṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0305t:233_2: Yathā hi saddhāpaññānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ dhuriyadhammabhūtānaṃ kiccato aññamaññanātivattanaṃ visesato icchitabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:233_4: evaṃ samādhivīriyānaṃ kosajjuddhaccapakkhikānaṃ samatāya sati aññamaññupatthambhanato sampayuttadhammānaṃ
tika-s0305t:233_14: Saddhāhīnāya paññāya atidhāvanto “deyyavatthupariccāgena vinā cittuppādamattenapi dānamayaṃ puññaṃ hotī”tiādīni parikappeti hetupatirūpakehi vañcito,
tika-s0305t:233_15: evaṃbhūto ca lūkhatakkaviluttacitto paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ nādiyati,
tika-s0305t:233_18: Yathā cettha saddhāpaññānaṃ aññamaññaṃ samabhāvo atthāvaho,
tika-s0305t:234_3: Saddahantoti “pathavī pathavīti manasikāramattena kathaṃ jhānuppattī”ti acintetvā “addhā sambuddhena vuttavidhi ijjhatī”ti saddahanto saddhaṃ janento.
tika-s0305t:234_4: Okappentoti ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā viya adhimuccanavasena avakappento pakkhandanto.
tika-s0305t:234_7: Samādhikammikassa samādhino adhimattatāya paññāya adhimattatāpi icchitabbāti āha “samatāyapī”ti,
tika-s0305t:234_13: Yadi visesato saddhāpaññānaṃ samādhivīriyānañca samānataṃ icchati,
tika-s0305t:234_26: sabbena vā līnuddhaccapakkhikena bojjhaṅgena atthetabbā sabbatthiyā,
tika-s0305t:234_29: Tassa hi satipaṭisaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya. Tenāha –
tika-s0305t:235_2: Taruṇavipassanāsamaṅgīpi bhāvanāmayañāṇe ṭhitattā ekaṃsato paññavā eva nāma hotīti āha –
tika-s0305t:235_7: Tañhi ñeyyaṃ tādisāya paññāya caritabbato gambhīrañāṇacariyaṃ,
tika-s0305t:235_8: tassā vā paññāya tattha pabhedato pavatti gambhīrañāṇacariyā,
tika-s0305t:235_11: evaṃ so eva paññāvepullappattopīti āha “arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hotī”ti.
tika-s0305t:236_0: “Tattaṃ ayokhilaṃ hatthe gamentī”tiādinā vuttapañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇā niraye nibbattasattassa sabbapaṭhamaṃ karontīti devadūtasuttādīsu,
tika-s0305t:236_4: saddena tadaññamanussehi tiracchānehi ca vibādhanīyakālaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0305t:236_5: Ekaṃ buddhantaranti idaṃ aparāparaṃ petesu eva uppajjanakasattavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0305t:236_7: ekaccatiracchānānaṃ viya tathā dīghāyukatāpi siyāti tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:236_8: Tathā hi kālo nāgarājā catunnaṃ buddhānaṃ rūpadassāvī.
tika-s0305t:237_0: Evaṃ ānisaṃsadassāvinoti “vīriyāyatto eva sakalalokiyalokuttaravisesādhigamo”ti evaṃ ānisaṃsadassanasīlassa.
tika-s0305t:237_4: Sā hi vaṭṭato niyyānāya gantabbā paṭipadāti katvā gamanavīthi nāma.
tika-s0305t:238_2: Paccayadāyakānaṃ attani kārassa attano sammāpaṭipattiyā mahapphalabhāvassa karaṇena piṇḍāya bhikkhāya paṭipūjanā piṇḍāpacāyanā.
tika-s0305t:238_4: Taṃ saddaṃ sutvāti taṃ upāsikāya vacanaṃ paṇṇasāladvāre ṭhitova pañcābhiññatāya dibbasotena sutvāti vadanti.
tika-s0305t:238_8: Sitaṃ karontovāti “akiccheneva mayā vaṭṭadukkhaṃ samatikkanta”nti paccavekkhaṇāvasāne sañjātapāmojjavasena sitaṃ karonto eva.
tika-s0305t:239_0: Alasānaṃ bhāvanāya nāmamattampi ajānantānaṃ kāyassa posanabahulānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ paribhuñjitvā seyyasukhādiṃ
tika-s0305t:239_2: “Divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāyā”tiādinā bhāvanārambhavasena āraddhavīriyānaṃ daḷhaparakkamānaṃ kālenakālaṃ upasaṅkamanā āraddhavīriyapuggalasevanā.
tika-s0305t:240_4: Tattha ānisaṃsadassāvitāya eva sammappadhānapaccavekkhaṇā gahitā lokiyalokuttaravisesādhigamassa vīriyāyattatādassanabhāvato.
tika-s0305t:241_1: Sakalasarīraṃ pharamānoti pītisamuṭṭhānehi paṇītarūpehi sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno.
tika-s0305t:241_2: Dhammasaṅghaguṇe anussarantassapi yāva upacārā sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno pītisambojjhaṅgo uppajjatīti yojanā.
tika-s0305t:241_3: Evaṃ sesaanussatīsu pasādanīyasuttantapaccavekkhaṇāya ca yojetabbaṃ tassāpi vimuttāyatanabhāvena taggatikattā.
tika-s0305t:241_6: na samudācarantīti idaṃ upasamānussatiyā vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:241_7: Saṅkhārānañhi sappadesavūpasamepi nippadesavūpasame viya tattha sapaññāya pavattanato bhāvanāmanasikāro
tika-s0305t:241_8: kilesavikkhambhanasamattho hutvā upacārasamādhiṃ āvahanto tathārūpapītisomanassasamannāgato pītisambojjhaṅgassa
tika-s0305t:241_11: Sā ca tattha ādaragāravākaraṇena viññāyatīti āha “asakkaccakiriyāya saṃsūcitalūkhabhāve”ti.
tika-s0305t:242_4: Tañhi tividhampi sappāyaṃ seviyamānaṃ kāyassa kallatāpādanavasena cittassa kallataṃ āvahantaṃ duvidhāyapi passaddhiyā kāraṇaṃ hoti.
tika-s0305t:242_5: Sattesu labbhamānaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ ahetukanti ayameko anto,
tika-s0305t:242_7: ete ubho ante anupagamma yathāsakaṃ kammunā hotīti ayaṃ majjhimā paṭipatti.
tika-s0305t:243_1: Samathāvahāpi tā honti samathāvahabhāveneva paññāvahattāti vuttaṃ “vatthuvisada…pe…
tika-s0305t:244_4: Tassa paggaṇhananti tassa līnassa cittassa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena layāpattito samuṭṭhāpanaṃ.
tika-s0305t:245_12: so tattha sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya,
tika-s0305t:245_17: bhabbo nu kho so puriso parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletunti. Evaṃ,
tika-s0305t:246_0: Ettha ca yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā samuṭṭhāpanāti veditabbā,
tika-s0305t:247_2: Tassa niggaṇhananti tassa uddhatassa cittassa samādhisambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena uddhatāpattito nisedhanaṃ.
tika-s0305t:248_14: bhabbo nu kho so puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetunti. Evaṃ,
tika-s0305t:249_0: Etthāpi yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena passaddhisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā samuṭṭhāpanāti veditabbā.
tika-s0305t:249_8: Tattha yadā paññā na balavatī hoti,
tika-s0305t:249_9: tadā bhāvanā pubbenāparaṃ visesāvahā na hoti,
tika-s0305t:249_10: anabhisaṅkhato viya āhāro purisassa yogino cittassa abhiruciṃ na uppādeti,
tika-s0305t:249_12: Tathā bhāvanāya sammadeva vīthipaṭipattiyā abhāvena upasamasukhaṃ na vindati,
tika-s0305t:250_0: Tassa saṃveguppādanañca pasāduppādanañca tikicchananti taṃ dassento “aṭṭha saṃvegavatthūnī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t:250_1: Tattha jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni yathārahaṃ sugatiyaṃ duggatiyañca hontīti tadaññameva pañcavidhabandhanādikhuppipāsādiaññamaññavibādhanādihetukaṃ
tika-s0305t:250_3: Tayidaṃ sabbaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ paccuppannabhavanissitaṃ gahitanti atīte anāgate ca kāle vaṭṭamūlakadukkhāni visuṃ gahitāniyeva.
tika-s0305t:250_4: Ye pana sattā āhārūpajīvino tattha ca uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino,
tika-s0305t:250_5: tesaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ jīvikadukkhaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ saṃvegavatthu gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:250_6: Ayaṃ vuccati samaye sampahaṃsanāti ayaṃ sampahaṃsitabbasamaye vuttanayena saṃvegajananavasena ceva pasāduppādanavasena ca sammadeva pahaṃsanā,
tika-s0305t:251_0: Sammāpaṭipattiṃ āgammāti līnuddhaccavirahena samathavīthipaṭipattiyā ca sammadeva bhāvanāpaṭipattiṃ āgamma.
tika-s0305t:252_11: Ayaṃ vuccati samaye ajjhupekkhanatāti ayaṃ ajjhupekkhitabbasamaye cittassa paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu
tika-s0305t:252_14: Arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hotīti etena nippariyāyato samādhivepullappattopi arahā evāti dasseti.
tika-s0305t:253_0: Anurodhavirodhapahānavasena majjhattabhāvo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa kāraṇaṃ tasmiṃ sati sijjhanato,
tika-s0305t:253_2: so ca majjhattabhāvo visayavasena duvidhoti āha “sattamajjhattatā saṅkhāramajjhattatā”ti.
tika-s0305t:253_3: Tadubhayavasena cassa virujjhanaṃ passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya eva dūrīkatanti anurujjhanasseva
tika-s0305t:253_8: Dvīhākārehīti kammassakatāpaccavekkhaṇaṃ attasuññatāpaccavekkhaṇanti imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi.
tika-s0305t:253_13: Sati hi attani tassa kiñcanabhāvena cīvaraṃ aññaṃ vā kiñci attaniyaṃ nāma siyā,
tika-s0305t:255_0: Asubhārammaṇā dhammāti asubhappakārā asubhajhānassa ārammaṇabhūtā dhammā.
tika-s0305t:255_2: visesato pana jigucchitabbe jigucchāvahe gaṇhanto “dasā”ti āha.
tika-s0305t:255_3: Yathā manasikaroto sabhāvasarasato tattha asubhasaññā santiṭṭhati,
tika-s0305t:256_0: Manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ suṭṭhu susaṃvaraṇe sati avasaraṃ alabhanto kāmacchando pahīyateva,
tika-s0305t:256_1: tathā bhojane mattaññuno mitāhārassa thinamiddhābhibhavābhāvā otāraṃ alabhamāno kāmacchando pahīyati.
tika-s0305t:256_2: Yo pana āhāre paṭikkūlasaññaṃ tabbipariṇāmassa tadādhārassa tassa ca udariyabhūtassa ativiya jegucchataṃ,
tika-s0305t:256_4: so sabbaso bhojane pamāṇassa jānanena visesato bhojane mattaññū nāma.
tika-s0305t:256_9: Abhidhammapariyāyena sabbopi lobho kāmacchandanīvaraṇanti “arahattamaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:257_4: Sā eva paṭipakkhato cetaso vimuttīti mettācetovimutti.
tika-s0305t:257_5: Tattha mettāyanassa sattesu hitapharaṇassa uppādanaṃ pavattanaṃ mettānimittassa uggaho.
tika-s0305t:258_5: sabbā itthiyo purisā ariyā anariyā devā manussā vinipātikāti sattodhikaraṇavasena pavattā sattavidhā,
tika-s0305t:258_8: ekekāya disāya sattādiitthādiaverādibhedena asītādhikacatusatappabhedā ca odhisopharaṇamettā.
tika-s0305t:258_13: sukhī attānaṃ pariharantūti catudhā pavattiyā vīsatividhā anodhisopharaṇamettā,
tika-s0305t:258_18: Paṭisaṅkhāne ṭhitassāti kodhe yathāvuttassa ādīnavassa tappaṭipakkhato akodhe mettāya ānisaṃsassa ca paṭisaṅkhāne sammadeva jānane.
tika-s0305t:259_0: Atibhojane nimittaggāhoti āhārassa adhikabhojane thinamiddhassa nimittaggāho,
tika-s0305t:260_0: Kukkuccampi katākatānusocanavasena pavattamānaṃ cetaso avūpasamāvahatāya uddhaccena samānalakkhaṇamevāti tadubhayassa pahānakāraṇaṃ dassento bhagavā – “atthi,
tika-s0305t:260_3: Tasmā bāhusaccādi tassa pahānakāraṇanti dassetuṃ “apica cha dhammā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t:260_5: atthato dhammaṃ vicārentassa attavedādipaṭilābhasambhavato vikkhepo na hoti.
tika-s0305t:260_10: Vuddhasevitā ca vuddhasīlitaṃ āvahatīti cetaso vūpasamakarattā uddhaccakukkuccassa pahānakārī vuttā,
tika-s0305t:260_11: vuddhabhāvaṃ pana anapekkhitvā vinayadharā kukkuccavinodakā kalyāṇamittāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0305t:260_12: Vikkhepo ca bhikkhūnaṃ yebhuyyena kukkuccahetuko hotīti “kappiyākappiyaparipucchābahulassā”tiādinā vinayanayeneva paripucchakatādayo niddiṭṭhā.
tika-s0305t:260_14: Kukkuccassa domanassasahagatattā anāgāmimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo vutto.
tika-s0305t:261_3: tathāpi ratanattayavicikicchāmūlikā sesavicikicchāti katvā vuttaṃ “tīṇi ratanāni ārabbhā”tiādi.
tika-s0305t:261_4: Vinaye pakataññutāya ca sati sikkhāya kaṅkhāya asambhavo eva,
tika-s0305t:261_5: tathā ratanattayaguṇāvabodhe sati pubbantādīsu saṃsayassāti āha –
tika-s0305t:261_10: Arahattena kūṭaṃ gaṇhi sattapi bojjhaṅge vitthāretvā desanāya osāpitattā.
tika-s0305t:264_2: Tato paranti tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ upari saṅgho catuvaggakaraṇīyādisaṅghakammavasena kammappattattā.
tika-s0305t:264_3: Pavisiṃsūti bhāvini pavisane bhūte viya katvā upacārena vuttanti āha –
tika-s0305t:264_5: Bhāvini hi bhūte viya upacāro. Tenāha –
tika-s0305t:264_8: Puna te panāti titthiyā titthiyasāvakā ca.
tika-s0305t:265_0: Imasmiṃ paññāpaneti “pañca nīvaraṇe pahāyā”tiādinayappavatte imasmiṃ pakāre atthapaññāpane.
tika-s0305t:265_10: Eseva nayoti yathā paṭhamasmiṃ pade atthayojanā,
tika-s0305t:266_0: Tīṇi ṭhānānīti devamārabrahmaṭṭhānāni tīṇi “sadevake loke”tiādinā loke pakkhipitvā.
tika-s0305t:266_5: Attano hatthapādādīsūti nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ samudāyaṃ ārabbha paṭighassa uppajjanato.
tika-s0305t:267_1: yaṃ pana kāyakammādhiṭṭhānādivasena manasi kāyikapayogasamuṭṭhāpanaṃ vīriyaṃ kāyikanti laddhapariyāyanti
tika-s0305t:267_3: Yadipi yathākappitairiyāpathasandhāraṇavasena pavattamānaṃ vīriyaṃ kāyassa tathāpavattassa paccayabhūtanti na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-s0305t:267_5: tadā pavatto natthīti vuttaṃ “kāyapayogaṃ vinā uppannavīriya”nti.
tika-s0305t:267_6: Satisambojjhaṅgasadiso vāti iminā ajjhattike saṅkhāre ajjhupekkhanavasena pavattā ajjhattadhammesu upekkhātiādinayaṃ atidisati.
tika-s0305t:268_1: Caṅkamantenapi ariyamaggaṃ adhigantuṃ sakkāti katvā vuttaṃ “maggaṃ apattaṃ kāyikavīriya”nti.
tika-s0305t:268_2: Bojjhaṅgā na labbhantīti nippariyāyabojjhaṅgā na labbhantī.
tika-s0305t:268_8: Ayaṃ pana nayo pacurappavattivasena aṭṭhakathānayeneva vutto.
tika-s0305t:268_9: Theravādavasena pana avitakkaavicāramattā pītisamādhisambojjhaṅgā rūpāvacarāpi atthīti tepi gahetvā dasa missakāva hontīti vattabbaṃ siyāti.
tika-s0305t:271_4: Paṭihārakammanti rañño santikaṃ āgatānaṃ vacanaṃ rañño nivedetvā tato nesaṃ paṭiharaṇakammaṃ.
tika-s0305t:274_3: Kīdisī paramā uttamā koṭi etissāti kiṃparamā.
tika-s0305t:274_4: Kīdisaṃ phalaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ udayo etissāti kiṃphalā.
tika-s0305t:274_7: idha pana mettājhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanāpubbabhāgabojjhaṅgā ca “mettāsahagataṃ satisambojjhaṅga”ntiādinā vuttāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:274_8: Sabbatthāti sabbesu bojjhaṅgesu sabbesu ca brahmavihāresu.
tika-s0305t:275_8: Aniccato vā upasaṃharatīti aniccanti manasikāraṃ pavatteti.
tika-s0305t:275_10: Chaḷaṅgupekkhanti chasu ārammaṇesu pahīnānurodhassa uppattiyā chaḷaṅgavantaṃ upekkhaṃ.
tika-s0305t:276_1: Paṭikūlādīsu vatthūsu icchitavihārena viharituṃ samatthatā ariyānaṃ eva,
tika-s0305t:276_2: tattha ca arahato eva ijjhanato ariyiddhi nāma.
tika-s0305t:276_3: Tassā ariyiddhiyā ca dassitattā desanā vinivaṭṭetabbā pariyosānetabbā siyā.
tika-s0305t:276_4: Arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na sakkoti indriyānaṃ aparipakkattā nikantiyā ca duppariyādānato.
tika-s0305t:276_5: Ayaṃ desanāti “mettāsahagataṃ bojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvetī”tiādinā ayaṃ desanā āraddhā.
tika-s0305t:276_6: Yo hi mettājhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā sammasanaṃ ārabhitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ asakkonto parisuddhesu vaṇṇakasiṇesu
tika-s0305t:277_4: Karuṇādīsupi eseva nayoti karuṇādijhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ sakkoti,
tika-s0305t:277_7: Puna desanārambhapayojanaṃ pana “iminā nayenā”ti heṭṭhā atidiṭṭhameva.
tika-s0305t:278_3: Tassa tassāti subhavimokkhassa heṭṭhā tiṇṇaṃ arūpajjhānānañca yathākkamaṃ upanissayattā.
tika-s0305t:278_8: Tato paranti tato subhavimokkhato paraṃ vimokkhānaṃ upanissayo nāma na hoti,
tika-s0305t:279_0: Sattadukkhaṃ samanupassantassāti daṇḍena abhihaṭappattarūpahetuṃ sattesu uppajjanakadukkhaṃ ñāṇena vīmaṃsantassa.
tika-s0305t:279_1: Tayidaṃ rūpanimittakaṃ sattesu uppajjanakaṃ dukkhaṃ ñāṇena karuṇāvihārissa visesato pakkhandatīti katvā
tika-s0305t:280_0: Viññāṇaṃ samanupassantassāti idaṃ pāmojjagahaṇamukhena tannissayaviññāṇassa gahaṇaṃ sambhavatīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:281_3: Avijjamānaggahaṇadukkhanti paramatthato avijjamānasattapaññattigahaṇaparicitaṃ tassa tassa abhāvamattakassa gahaṇampi dukkhaṃ kusalampi hoti.
tika-s0305t:284_2: Asajjhāyakatānaṃ mantānaṃ appaṭibhānaṃ pageva paṭhamaṃyeva siddhaṃ,
tika-s0305t:285_0: “Aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahatī”tiādīsu byāpādādīnaṃ anāgatattā abyāpādavāre tadaṅganissaraṇaṃ na gahitaṃ.
tika-s0305t:285_2: paṭisaṅkhānavasena pana tassa vinodetabbatāya tadaṅganissaraṇampi labbhatevāti sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-s0305t:286_1: Usmudakajātoti tasseva kuthitabhāvassa usmudakataṃ accuṇhataṃ patto.
tika-s0305t:289_1: Ekaṃsena bhagavā nīvaraṇāti ekaṃsato eva bhagavā ete dhammā nīvaraṇā citte kusalappavattiyā nīvaraṇato.
tika-s0305t:294_3: Chavicammampi upaṭṭhātīti idaṃ saviññāṇakaṃ aviññāṇakampi kāyasāmaññato gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:294_4: Sati vā upādiseseti ettha upādiyati attano ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhātīti upādi, upādānaṃ,
tika-s0305t:298_13: Ettha ca ārammaṇādīsu yathāyogaṃ appanaṃ upacāraṃ vā pāpuṇitvā arahattappattassa pubbabhāgabhūtā vipassanāmaggabojjhaṅgā kathitā.
tika-s0305t:304_8: atha kho aññepi maggapariyāyāti paduddhāraṃ karonto “maggassa hī”tiādiṃ vatvā yadi maggapariyāyo āyana- saddo,
tika-s0305t:304_9: kasmā puna maggoti vuttanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “tasmā”tiādi.
tika-s0305t:304_17: uddese satiyā eva gahaṇaṃ veneyyajjhāsayavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0305t:304_19: Na dvedhāpathabhūtoti iminā imassa dvayabhāvābhāvaṃ viya anibbānagāmibhāvābhāvañca dasseti.
tika-s0305t:305_2: moho mala”nti evaṃ vuttehi rāgādīhi malehi.
tika-s0305t:305_3: Sā panāyaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhacittānaṃ visuddhi sijjhamānā yasmā sokādīnaṃ anuppādāya saṃvattati,
tika-s0305t:305_5: Tattha socanaṃ ñātibyasanādinimittaṃ cetaso santāpo antonijjhānaṃ soko.
tika-s0305t:305_6: Ñātibyasanādinimittameva sokādhikatājanito “kahaṃ ekaputtakā”tiādinā paridevanavasena vācāvippalāpo paridevanaṃ paridevo.
tika-s0305t:305_7: Tassa āyatiṃ anuppajjanaṃ idha samatikkamoti āha “pahānāyā”ti.
tika-s0305t:305_8: Dukkhadomanassānanti ettha cetasikadukkhatāya domanassassapi dukkhasaddeneva gahaṇe siddhe saddena anivattanato
tika-s0305t:305_11: Ñāyati etena yāthāvato paṭivijjhīyati catusaccanti ñāyo vuccati ariyamaggo.
tika-s0305t:305_13: kiṃ maggo eva maggassa adhigamāya hotīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha –
tika-s0305t:305_16: Tena taṇhāvānena virahitattā tassa abhāvāti attho.
tika-s0305t:307_0: Na tato heṭṭhāti idha adhippetakāyādīnaṃ vedanādisabhāvattābhāvā kāyavedanācittavimuttassa tebhūmakadhammassa
tika-s0305t:307_1: visuṃ vipallāsavatthantarabhāvena gahitattā ca heṭṭhā gahaṇesu vipallāsavatthūnaṃ aniṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:307_2: Pañcamassa pana vipallāsavatthuno abhāvena “na uddha”nti āha.
tika-s0305t:307_5: na idha pāḷiyaṃ vuttassa satipaṭṭhānasaddassa atthadassanaṃ.
tika-s0305t:307_9: manasikārasamudayā dhammānaṃ samudayo”ti satipaṭṭhānāti vuttānaṃ satigocarānaṃ pakāsake suttapadese saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0305t:308_0: Ariyoti ārakattādinā ariyaṃ sammāsambuddhamāha. Etthāti etasmiṃ saḷāyatanavibhaṅgasutte. Tattha hi –
tika-s0305t:309_4: satthā sāvakānaṃ dhammaṃ deseti anukampako hitesī anukampaṃ upādāya –
tika-s0305t:309_13: anavassuto ca viharati sato sampajāno. Idaṃ,
tika-s0305t:309_23: na ca vokkamma satthusāsanā vattanti. Tatra,
tika-s0305t:309_29: Anattamanatañca attamanatañca tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno. Idaṃ,
tika-s0305t:309_39: anavassuto ca viharati sato sampajāno. Idaṃ,
tika-s0305t:310_0: Evaṃ paṭighānunayehi anavassutatā niccaṃ upaṭṭhitassatitāya tadubhayavītivattatā “satipaṭṭhāna”nti vuttā.
tika-s0305t:310_1: Buddhānaṃyeva hi niccaṃ upaṭṭhitassatitā hoti āveṇikadhammabhāvato,
tika-s0305t:310_4: ārambho ca pavattīti katvā āha “pavattayitabbatoti attho”ti.
tika-s0305t:310_5: Satiyā karaṇabhūtāya paṭṭhānaṃ paṭṭhapetabbaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Ana-
tika-s0305t:311_2: saddo bhusatthavisiṭṭhaṃ pakkhandanaṃ dīpetīti “okkanditvā pakkhanditvā pavattatīti attho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:311_3: Puna bhāvatthaṃ satisaddaṃ paṭṭhānasaddañca vaṇṇento “atha vā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t:312_0: Yadi evanti yadi sati eva satipaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0305t:312_2: evaṃ sante kasmā satipaṭṭhānāti bahuvacananti āha “satīnaṃ bahuttā”tiādi.
tika-s0305t:312_7: teneva niyyānikabhāvena ekattupagato ekantato nibbānaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0305t:312_9: Tattha catassopi cetāti kāyānupassanādivasena catubbidhāpi ca etā satiyo.
tika-s0305t:312_11: Kiccaṃ sādhayamānāti pubbabhāge kāyādīsu ārammaṇesu subhasaññādividhamanavasena visuṃ visuṃ pavattitvā
tika-s0305t:312_12: maggakkhaṇe sakiṃyeva tattha catubbidhassapi vipallāsassa samucchedavasena pahānakiccaṃ sādhayamānā ārammaṇakaraṇavasena
tika-s0305t:312_15: tathāpi atthato bhedābhāvato maggoti ekavacanena vuccati. Tenāha –
tika-s0305t:313_0: Kathetukamyatāpucchā itarāsaṃ pucchānaṃ idha asambhavato niddesādivasena desetukāmatāya ca tathā vuttattā.
tika-s0305t:313_3: “yā tasmiṃ samaye kāyassa passaddhi paṭippassaddhī”tiādīsu vedanādayo tayo cetasikā khandhā “kāyo”ti vuccanti,
tika-s0305t:313_5: Kāyānupassīti ettha tassīlatthaṃ dassento “kāyaṃ anupassanasīlo”ti āha.
tika-s0305t:313_7: evaṃ passanto eva cassa aniccākārampi anupassatīti vuccati,
tika-s0305t:313_8: tathābhūtassa cassa niccagāhassa visesopi na hotīti vuttaṃ “no niccato”ti.
tika-s0305t:313_10: Ettha ca aniccato eva anupassatīti evakāro luttaniddiṭṭhoti tena nivattitamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “no niccato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:313_11: Na cettha dukkhānupassanādinivattanamāsaṅkitabbaṃ paṭiyoginivattanaparattā eva- kārassa,
tika-s0305t:313_15: aniccassa dukkhattā tameva kāyaṃ dukkhato anupassati,
tika-s0305t:314_0: Yasmā pana yaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā,
tika-s0305t:314_19: Ayañhi aniccādianupassanā tadaṅgavasena saddhiṃ kāyatannissayakhandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilesānaṃ pariccajanato
tika-s0305t:314_20: saṅkhatadosadassanena tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandanato “pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo
tika-s0305t:314_22: Tasmā tāya samannāgato bhikkhu vuttanayena kilese ca pariccajati,
tika-s0305t:314_24: tathābhūto ca pariccajanavasena kilese na ādiyati,
tika-s0305t:314_28: Idāni nissitāhi anupassanāhi yesaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānaṃ hoti,
tika-s0305t:314_29: taṃ dassetuṃ “aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:314_30: Tattha niccasaññanti saṅkhārā niccāti evaṃ pavattaṃ viparītasaññaṃ.
tika-s0305t:315_0: Viharatīti iminā kāyānupassanāsamaṅgino iriyāpathavihāro vuttoti āha –
tika-s0305t:315_5: Yadipi kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ ātāpananti taṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnampi attheva, ātappa-
tika-s0305t:315_7: saddopi vīriye eva niruḷhoti vuttaṃ “vīriyassetaṃ nāma”nti.
tika-s0305t:315_8: Atha vā paṭipakkhappahāne sampayuttadhammānaṃ abbhussahanavasena pavattamānassa vīriyassa sātisayaṃ tadātāpananti vīriyameva tathā vuccati,
tika-s0305t:316_1: atisayassa vā dīpakoti ātāpīgahaṇena sammappadhānasamaṅgitaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0305t:316_5: uparūpari visesāvahabhāvena pavattiyā sāmaṃ pajānantoti attho.
tika-s0305t:316_8: Tasmā satiyā laddhupakārāya eva paññāya ettha yathāvutte kāye kammaṭṭhāniko bhikkhu anupassako,
tika-s0305t:316_12: Upāyapariggahoti ettha sīlavisodhanādi gaṇanādi uggahakosallādi ca upāyo,
tika-s0305t:316_14: Yasmā ca upaṭṭhitassatī yathāvuttaṃ upāyaṃ na pariccajati,
tika-s0305t:316_18: Tenāti upāyānupāyānaṃ pariggahaparivajjanesu apariccāgāpariggahesu ca asamatthabhāvena.
tika-s0305t:317_4: Satiggahaṇenevettha sammāsamādhissapi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ tassā samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitattā.
tika-s0305t:317_6: Na hi kevalāya satiyā kilesappahānaṃ sambhavati,
tika-s0305t:317_9: tasmāssa jhānadesanāyaṃ savitakkādivacanassa viya sampayogaṅgadassanatāti aṅga-
tika-s0305t:317_14: tasmā pubbabhāgiyameva vinayaṃ dassento “tadaṅgavinayena vā vikkhambhanavinayena vā”ti āha.
tika-s0305t:317_21: tā ca lokiyā eva anupassanā nāma sammasananti katvā.
tika-s0305t:318_3: Yo sukhaṃ dukkhato addāti yo bhikkhu sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vipariṇāmadukkhatāya dukkhanti paññācakkhunā addakkhi.
tika-s0305t:318_4: Dukkhamaddakkhi sallatoti dukkhavedanaṃ pīḷājananato antotudanato dunnīharaṇato ca sallanti addakkhi passi.
tika-s0305t:318_6: Santanti sukhadukkhānaṃ viya anoḷārikatāya paccayavasena vūpasantasabhāvattā ca santaṃ.
tika-s0305t:318_7: Aniccatoti hutvā abhāvato udayabbayavantato tāvakālikato niccapaṭikkhepato ca aniccanti yo addakkhi.
tika-s0305t:318_8: Sa ve sammaddaso bhikkhūti so bhikkhu ekaṃsena,
tika-s0305t:318_9: paribyattaṃ vā vedanāya sammā passanakoti attho.
tika-s0305t:319_1: Sabbaṃ taṃ vedayitaṃ dukkhasmiṃ antogadhaṃ pariyāpannanti vadāmi saṅkhāradukkhanti vattabbato.
tika-s0305t:319_2: Sukhadukkhatopi cāti sukhādīnaṃ ṭhitivipariṇāmañāṇasukhatāya ca vipariṇāmaṭṭhitiaññāṇadukkhatāya ca vuttattā
tika-s0305t:319_3: tissopi sukhato tissopi ca dukkhato anupassitabbāti attho.
tika-s0305t:320_14: saddena savatthukāvatthukādinānattassa puggalattayasādhāraṇāditabbhedassa ca saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0305t:321_2: sāmaññalakkhaṇāna”nti hi iminā yo ito bāhirakehi sāminivāsīkārakavedakaadhiṭṭhāyakabhāvena parikappito attā,
tika-s0305t:321_3: tassa saṅkhāresu niccatā sukhatā viya katthacipi abhāvo vibhāvito.
tika-s0305t:321_5: yasmā pana saṅkhāresu ekadhammopi attā na hoti,
tika-s0305t:321_6: tasmā te na attātipi anattāti ayaṃ tesaṃ suññatadhammo.
tika-s0305t:321_8: yaṃ vibhāvetuṃ abhidhamme “tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā hontī”tiādinā suññatavāradesanā vuttā.
tika-s0305t:324_2: Ayaṃ pana na yāya kāyaci satiyā sato,
tika-s0305t:324_12: Ṭhānanisajjāsayanesu yo gamanādividhinā kāyassa purato abhihāro,
tika-s0305t:324_19: Eseva nayoti iminā sarīrasseva abhimukhasaṃsappanapaṭiāsappanāni nidasseti.
tika-s0305t:325_1: Tena attanā kātabbakiccassa karaṇasīlo sampajānakārīti āha –
tika-s0305t:325_5: Sampajaññaṃ karotevāti abhikkantādīsu asammohaṃ uppādeti eva,
tika-s0305t:325_6: sampajānasseva vā kāro etassa atthīti sampajānakārī.
tika-s0305t:326_0: Dhammato vaḍḍhitasaṅkhātena saha atthena vattatīti sātthakaṃ,
tika-s0305t:326_3: Sappāyassa attano upakārāvahassa hitassa sampajānanaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ.
tika-s0305t:326_5: aññatthāpi ca pavattesu avijahite kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte gocare sampajaññaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ.
tika-s0305t:326_12: Saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “cetiyaṃ disvāpi hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:328_1: Attho nāma dhammato vaḍḍhīti yaṃ sātthakanti adhippetaṃ gamanaṃ,
tika-s0305t:328_2: taṃ sappāyamevāti siyā kassaci āsaṅkāti tannivattanatthaṃ “cetiyadassanaṃ tāvā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0305t:328_4: yantapayogena vā vicittakammā paṭimāya sadisā yantarūpakā viya.
tika-s0305t:328_6: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjati upekkhā bālassa mūḷhassa puthujjanassā”tiādi.
tika-s0305t:329_1: ananuvattanakathā pana tassā aparā dutiyā nāma hotīti āha –
tika-s0305t:329_3: Evanti iminā “sace panā”tiādikaṃ sabbampi vuttākāraṃ paccāmasati,
tika-s0305t:330_0: Yogakammassa pavattiṭṭhānatāya bhāvanāya ārammaṇaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuccatīti āha “kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ gocara”nti.
tika-s0305t:331_2: Na paccāharatīti āhārūpabhogato yāva divāṭṭhānupasaṅkamanā kammaṭṭhānaṃ na paṭineti.
tika-s0305t:331_3: Samādāya vattati sammā ādiyitvā tesaṃ vattānaṃ paripūraṇavasena vattati.
tika-s0305t:331_5: Dve tayo pallaṅketi dve tayo nisajjāvāre dve tīṇi uṇhāsanāni. Tenāha –
tika-s0305t:331_11: Paribhogacetiyato sarīracetiyaṃ garutaranti katvā “cetiyaṃ vanditvā”ti cetiyavandanāya paṭhamaṃ karaṇīyatā vuttā.
tika-s0305t:332_0: Janasaṅgahaṇatthanti “mayi akathente etesaṃ ko kathessatī”ti dhammānuggahena janasaṅgahaṇatthaṃ.
tika-s0305t:332_1: Tasmāti yasmā “dhammakathā nāma kathetabbā evā”ti aṭṭhakathācariyā vadanti,
tika-s0305t:332_2: yasmā ca dhammakathā kammaṭṭhānavinimuttā nāma natthi, tasmā.
tika-s0305t:332_3: Kammaṭṭhānasīsenevāti attanā parihariyamānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ avijahanto tadanuguṇaṃyeva dhammakathaṃ kathetvā.
tika-s0305t:332_5: Sampattaparicchedenevāti paricito aparicitotiādivibhāgaṃ akatvā sampattakoṭiyā eva,
tika-s0305t:334_5: Yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharati.
tika-s0305t:334_6: Aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ caratī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ pañcavidhacetovinibandhacitto.
tika-s0305t:335_0: Gatapaccāgatikavattavasenāti bhāvanāsahitaṃyeva bhikkhāya gatapaccāgataṃ gamanapaccāgamanaṃ etassa atthīti gatapaccāgatikaṃ,
tika-s0305t:335_6: Atha vā viññūnaṃ dhammānaṃ attaniyattā attabhāvaparicchannattā ca attā nāma dhammo.
tika-s0305t:335_15: So eva nayo ayaṃ bhikkhūtiādiko yo ṭhāne vutto,
tika-s0305t:336_1: Mahāpadhānaṃ pūjessāmīti amhākaṃ atthāya lokanāthena cha vassāni kataṃ dukkaracariyaṃ evāhaṃ yathāsatti pūjessāmīti.
tika-s0305t:337_0: Vīthiṃ otaritvā ito cito anoloketvā paṭhamameva vīthiyo sallakkhetabbāti āha “vīthiyo sallakkhetvā”ti.
tika-s0305t:337_6: Aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatanti “yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā”tiādinā vuttehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ katvā.
tika-s0305t:338_3: evaṃ ito paresu ṭhānesu upanetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:338_4: Tattha paccekabodhiyā upanissayasampadā kappānaṃ dve asaṅkhyeyyāni satasahassañca tajjaṃ puññañāṇasambhārasambharaṇaṃ,
tika-s0305t:338_7: itaresaṃ atītāsu jātīsu vivaṭṭasannissayavasena nibbattitaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ kusalaṃ.
tika-s0305t:338_12: diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissatī”tiādivasappavattena saṃkhitteneva ovādena khippataraṃ visesaṃ adhigacchi.
tika-s0305t:338_13: Tena vuttaṃ “khippābhiñño vā hoti seyyathāpi thero bāhiyo dārucīriyo”ti.
tika-s0305t:339_2: Attā abhikkamatīti iminā andhaputhujjanassa diṭṭhiggāhavasena abhikkame sammuyhanaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0305t:339_4: tadubhayaṃ pana taṇhāya vinā na hotīti taṇhāggāhavasenapi sammuyhanaṃ dassitameva hoti,
tika-s0305t:339_5: “tathā asammuyhanto”ti vatvā taṃ asammuyhanaṃ yena ghanavinibbhogena hoti,
tika-s0305t:339_7: Tattha yasmā vāyodhātuyā anugatā tejodhātu uddharaṇassa paccayo.
tika-s0305t:339_8: Uddharaṇagatikā hi tejodhātūti uddharaṇe vāyodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo,
tika-s0305t:339_9: tasmā imāsaṃ dvinnamettha dhātūnaṃ sāmatthiyato adhimattatā,
tika-s0305t:339_12: Yasmā pana tejodhātuyā anugatā vāyodhātu atiharaṇavītiharaṇānaṃ paccayo.
tika-s0305t:339_13: Tiriyagatikāya hi vāyodhātuyā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesu sātisayo byāpāroti tejodhātuyā tassānugatabhāvo,
tika-s0305t:340_6: tato paraṃ haraṇaṃ vītiharaṇanti ayaṃ vā etesaṃ viseso.
tika-s0305t:340_7: Yasmā pathavīdhātuyā anugatā āpodhātu vossajjanassa paccayo.
tika-s0305t:340_8: Garutarasabhāvā hi āpodhātūti vossajjane pathavīdhātuyā tassānugatabhāvo,
tika-s0305t:340_12: Yasmā pana āpodhātuyā anugatā pathavīdhātu sannikkhepanassa paccayo.
tika-s0305t:340_13: Patiṭṭhābhāve viya patiṭṭhāpanepi tassā sātisayakiccattā āpodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo,
tika-s0305t:340_14: tathā ghaṭṭanakiriyāya pathavīdhātuyā vasena sannirumbhanassa sijjhanato tatthāpi pathavīdhātuyā āpodhātuanugatabhāvo,
tika-s0305t:341_1: tesu vā vuttesu uddharaṇādīsu chasu koṭṭhāsesu.
tika-s0305t:341_3: Rūpārūpadhammāti uddharaṇākārena pavattā rūpadhammā taṃsamuṭṭhāpakā arūpadhammā ca.
tika-s0305t:341_8: Pabbaṃ pabbantiādi uddharaṇādikoṭṭhāse sandhāya sabhāgasantativasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:341_10: gamanassādānaṃ devaputtānaṃ heṭṭhupariyāyena paṭimukhaṃ dhāvantānaṃ sirasi pāde ca baddhakhuradhārāsamāgamatopi sīghataro.
tika-s0305t:341_11: Yathā tilānaṃ bhajjiyamānānaṃ taṭataṭāyanena bhedo lakkhīyati,
tika-s0305t:342_0: Saddhiṃ rūpenāti idaṃ tassa tassa cittassa nirodhena saddhiṃ nirujjhanakarūpadhammavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0305t:342_8: Cittacetasikā hi sārammaṇasabhāvā yathābalaṃ attano ārammaṇapaccayabhūtamatthaṃ vibhāventāyeva uppajjantīti
tika-s0305t:342_11: Evaṃ tesaṃ pakāsetabbabhāvanipphatti soḷasahi cittehi hotīti taṅkhaṇāyukatā tesaṃ icchitā,
tika-s0305t:342_17: pacchājātapaccayo ca tassevāti rūpārūpadhammānaṃ samānakkhaṇatā na yujjateva,
tika-s0305t:343_1: aññaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhatīti yaṃ purimuppannaṃ cittaṃ,
tika-s0305t:343_3: taṃ pana nirujjhantaṃ aparassa anantarādipaccayo hutvā eva nirujjhatīti tathāladdhapaccayaṃ aññaṃ uppajjate cittaṃ.
tika-s0305t:343_8: evaṃ anu anu pabandho cittasantāno rūpasantāno ca nadīsotova nadiyaṃ udakappavāho viya vattati.
tika-s0305t:344_1: Yasmā yaṃdisābhimukho gacchati tiṭṭhati nisīdati vā,
tika-s0305t:344_3: tasmā tadanugataṃ vidisālokanaṃ vilokitanti āha “vilokitaṃ nāma anudisāpekkhana”nti.
tika-s0305t:344_6: pacchato āgacchantassa parissayassa parivajjanādivasena apalokitassa ca siyā sambhavoti āha –
tika-s0305t:345_2: Sohāyasmā vipassanākāle eva “yamevāhaṃ indriyesu aguttadvārataṃ nissāya sāsane anabhiratiādivippakāraṃ patto,
tika-s0305t:345_8: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ yadidaṃ nando”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
tika-s0305t:346_0: Sātthakatā ca sappāyatā ca veditabbā ālokitavilokitassāti ānetvā sambandho.
tika-s0305t:346_1: Tasmāti kammaṭṭhānāvijahanasseva gocarasampajaññabhāvatoti vuttamevatthaṃ hetubhāvena paccāmasati.
tika-s0305t:346_3: khandhādikammaṭṭhānikehi añño upāyo na gavesitabboti adhippāyo.
tika-s0305t:346_5: tasmā tassa yāthāvato pajānanaṃ asammohasampajaññanti dassetuṃ “abbhantare”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:346_8: Uddhaṃ laṅghetīti laṅghantaṃ viya upari gacchati.
tika-s0305t:347_3: sattamajavanepi na hotīti idaṃ pañcadvāraviññāṇavīthiyaṃ “itthī puriso”ti rajjanādīnaṃ abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:347_4: Tattha hi āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanānaṃ ayoniso āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanavasena iṭṭhe itthirūpādimhi lobhamattaṃ,
tika-s0305t:347_10: āgantukatāvakālikatā pana pañcadvārajavanasseva apubbabhāvavasena ceva ittarabhāvavasena ca vuttā.
tika-s0305t:347_11: Heṭṭhupariyavasena bhijjitvā patitesūti heṭṭhimassa uparimassa ca aparāparaṃ bhaṅgappattimāha.
tika-s0305t:351_1: Sīlassa vidūsanena ahitāvahattā micchājīvavasena uppannaṃ asappāyaṃ.
tika-s0305t:351_2: “Cīvarampi acetana”ntiādinā cīvarassa viya kāyopi acetanoti kāyassa attasuññatāvibhāvanena “abbhantare”tiādinā
tika-s0305t:353_1: Mahāsivattheravādavasena “imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā”tiādinā nayena vutto daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0305t:353_2: Imasmiṃ pakkhe “neva davāyātiādinā nayenā”ti pana idaṃ paṭikkhepaṅgadassanamukhena pāḷi āgatāti katvā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:354_0: Pathavīsandhārakajalassa taṃsandhārakavāyunā viya paribhuttassa āhārassa vāyodhātuyāva āsaye avaṭṭhānanti āha –
tika-s0305t:354_3: Vītiharatīti tato kucchiyaṃ vimissaṃ karonto harati.
tika-s0305t:354_7: Ettha ca āhārassa dhāraṇaparivattanasañcuṇṇanavisosanāni pathavīdhātusahitā eva vāyodhātu karoti,
tika-s0305t:354_8: na kevalāti tāni pathavīdhātuyā kiccabhāvena vuttāni,
tika-s0305t:354_9: sā eva dhāraṇādīni kiccāni karontassa sādhāraṇāti vuttāni.
tika-s0305t:354_10: Allattañca anupāletīti yathā vāyodhātuādīhi aññehi visosanaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0305t:354_14: Añjaso hotīti āhārassa pavisanādīnaṃ maggo hoti.
tika-s0305t:354_21: Atha vā sammāpayogaṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ anvāya āgamma ābhujati samannāharati.
tika-s0305t:354_22: Ābhogapubbako hi sabbopi viññāṇabyāpāroti tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:355_4: Āsayati ettha ekajjhaṃ pavattamānopi kammabalavavatthito hutvā mariyādavasena aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarato sayati tiṭṭhati pavattatīti āsayo,
tika-s0305t:355_7: Nidheti yathābhutto āhāro nicito hutvā tiṭṭhati etthāti nidhānaṃ, āmāsayo,
tika-s0305t:356_0: Sarīrato sedā muccantīti vegasandhāraṇena uppannapariḷāhato sarīrato sedā muccanti.
tika-s0305t:356_3: Kuddhā hi manussā amanussāpi vā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpenti.
tika-s0305t:356_5: kassaci anissajjitattā jigucchanīyattā ca na parassa,
tika-s0305t:357_0: Ettha ca eko iriyāpatho dvīsu ṭhānesu āgato,
tika-s0305t:357_2: “Gamanepi purato pacchato ca kāyassa abhiharaṇaṃ vuttanti idha gamanameva gahita”nti apare.
tika-s0305t:357_4: tasmā antarantare iriyāpathe pavattānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ tattha tattheva nirodhadassanavasena sampajānakāritā gahitāti.
tika-s0305t:357_6: eko hi bhikkhu gacchanto aññaṃ cintento,
tika-s0305t:357_14: Ettakena pana na pākaṭaṃ hotīti caṅkamanena dīpenti.
tika-s0305t:357_15: Yo bhikkhu caṅkamanaṃ otaritvā caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ ṭhito pariggaṇhāti –
tika-s0305t:357_16: “pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pavattā rūpārūpadhammā pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā,
tika-s0305t:357_17: pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pavattāpi pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā,
tika-s0305t:357_18: caṅkamanamajjhe pavattā ubho koṭiyo appatvā ettheva niruddhā,
tika-s0305t:357_19: caṅkamane pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ṭhānaṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā,
tika-s0305t:357_20: ṭhāne pavattā nisajjaṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā,
tika-s0305t:357_21: nisajjāya pavattā sayanaṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā”ti,
tika-s0305t:357_22: evaṃ pariggaṇhanto pariggaṇhanto eva cittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otāreti,
tika-s0305t:357_24: Ayaṃ bhikkhu gatādīsu sampajānakārī nāma hotīti.
tika-s0305t:358_3: tāva caṅkamitvā ṭhatvā nisīditvā sayamāno evaṃ pariggahetvā sayati –
tika-s0305t:358_8: evaṃ pariggaṇhanto eva cittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otāreti,
tika-s0305t:358_9: pabujjhanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva pabujjhatīti ayaṃ sutte sampajānakārī nāma hoti.
tika-s0305t:358_10: Kāyikādikiriyānibbattanena tammayattā āvajjanakiriyānibbattakattā āvajjanakiriyāsamuṭṭhitattā ca javanaṃ,
tika-s0305t:358_12: tasmiṃ sati jāgaritaṃ nāma hotīti pariggaṇhanto jāgarite sampajānakārī nāma.
tika-s0305t:358_13: Apica rattindivaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā pañca koṭṭhāse jaggantopi jāgarite sampajānakārī nāma hotīti.
tika-s0305t:359_0: Vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā dhammaṃ desentopi bāttiṃsatiracchānakathaṃ pahāya dasakathāvatthunissitasappāyakathaṃ
tika-s0305t:359_2: Aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu cittaruciyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ manasikāraṃ pavattentopi dutiyajjhānaṃ samāpannopi tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī nāma.
tika-s0305t:359_3: Dutiyañhi jhānaṃ vacīsaṅkhārappahānato visesato tuṇhībhāvo nāmāti.
tika-s0305t:359_6: Tadanurūpaṃ payoganti tassa uppattiyā anucchavikaṃ cittassa pavattiākārasaññitaṃ payogaṃ,
tika-s0305t:362_2: bhagavā saṃkhittena dhamma”nti saṃkhittena dhammadesanaṃ yāci,
tika-s0305t:362_4: tasmā saṃkhitteneva dhammaṃ desetukāmo bhagavā “tasmātihā”tiādimāhāti vuttaṃ –
tika-s0305t:364_1: Yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne apāyadukkhe apātanavasena dhāraṇaṭṭhena dhammo,
tika-s0305t:364_3: tadeva tadaṅgādivasena kilesānaṃ vinayanaṭṭhena vinayoti āha –
tika-s0305t:364_5: Paṭipakkhadhammehi anabhibhūtatāya eko udetīti ekodīti laddhanāmo samādhi bhūto jāto etesanti ekodibhūtā.
tika-s0305t:364_6: Ettha ca ekodibhūtāti etena upacārajjhānāvaho pubbabhāgiko samādhi vutto.
tika-s0305t:364_8: Ekaggacittāti etena subhāvito vasippatto appanāsamādhi vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-s0305t:364_14: sekkhānaṃ pana satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā pariññatthāya pavattā lokiyā,
tika-s0305t:368_17: attano balamadena lāpaṃ atimaññitvā vadantīti attho.
tika-s0305t:368_21: Yaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “attano balassa suṭṭhu vaṇṇaṃ vadamānā”ti,
tika-s0305t:368_26: Suṭṭhu ṭhapetvāti jiyāmuttasarassa viya sīghapātayogyatākaraṇena ubho pakkhe sammā ṭhapetvā.
tika-s0305t:370_3: Kājasikkā viyāti kājadaṇḍake olaggetabbā sikkā viya.
tika-s0305t:370_4: Apica catasso rajjuyo upari bandhanaṭṭhānañcāti pañcaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0305t:372_13: Idaṃ me kammaṭṭhānaṃ anulomaṃvāti idaṃ mama kammaṭṭhānaṃ evaṃ pavattamānaṃ anulomāvasānameva hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0305t:372_14: Evaṃ puna pavattamānaṃ ussakkitvā visesanibbattanatthameva hotīti evaṃ nimittaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti bālo abyatto,
tika-s0305t:372_17: Pubbabhāgavipassanā satipaṭṭhānāva kathitā “sakassa cittassa nimittaṃ uggaṇhātī”ti vuttattā.
tika-s0305t:374_6: lakkhaṇo mittabhāvo yesu atthi, te mittā.
tika-s0305t:374_12: Pañcamiyaṃ aṭṭhamiyaṃ cātuddasiyaṃ pañcadasiyanti ekekasmiṃ pakkhe cattāro vāre katvā māsassa aṭṭhavāre.
tika-s0305t:375_1: Ābādhoti pubbakammahetutāya kammasamuṭṭhāno ābādho saṅkhāradukkhatāsaṅkhāto sabbakālikattā sarīrassa sabhāgarogo nāma.
tika-s0305t:375_12: Jīvitampi jīvitasaṅkhāro patituṃ adatvā attabhāvassa abhisaṅkharaṇato.
tika-s0305t:376_0: “Ettakaṃ kālaṃ atikkamitvā vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti khaṇaparicchedavatī samāpatti khaṇikasamāpatti.
tika-s0305t:376_1: Niggumbaṃ nijjaṭaṃ katvāti rūpasattakārūpasattakavasena pavattiyamānaṃ vipassanābhāvanaṃ sabbaso khilavirahena niggumbaṃ,
tika-s0305t:376_3: Mahāvipassanāvasenāti paccekaṃ savisesaṃ vitthāritānaṃ aṭṭhārasādīnaṃ mahāvipassanānaṃ vasena vipassitvā samāpannā yā samāpatti,
tika-s0305t:376_4: sā suṭṭhu vikkhambheti vedanaṃ mahābalavatāya pubbārammaṇassa,
tika-s0305t:378_0: Anantaraṃ abāhiranti dhammavasena puggalavasena ca antarabāhiraṃ akatvā.
tika-s0305t:378_3: Na evaṃ hotīti “ahaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāmī”tiādiko mānataṇhāmūlako issāmacchariyānaṃ pavattiākāro tathāgatassa na hoti,
tika-s0305t:378_7: Maññeti yathāvuttaṃ paṭisaṅkharaṇasaññitena veṭhamissakena viya jarasakaṭaṃ.
tika-s0305t:379_0: Phalasamāpattiyā adhippetattā “ekaccānaṃ vedanānanti lokiyānaṃ vedanāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:379_5: So hi catūhi oghehi anajjhottharaṇīyato “dīpo”ti vutto.
tika-s0305t:379_8: Te “dhammadīpā viharathā”ti vuttā catusatipaṭṭhānagocarāva bhikkhū agge bhavissanti.
tika-s0305t:381_3: svāyaṃ pubbāparaviseso upādāyupādāya gahetabboti taṃ dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t:382_0: Uppajjati kilesapariḷāhoti kāye asubhādivasena manasikāraṃ adahantassa manasikārassa vīthiyaṃ apaṭipannatā
tika-s0305t:382_2: Vīriyārambhassa abhāvena tasmiṃ ārammaṇe cetaso vā līnattaṃ hoti,
tika-s0305t:382_4: Evaṃ kilesapariḷāhe cātiādinā tividhampi bhāvanānuyogassa kilesavatthubhāvaṃ upādāya samuccayavasena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:382_5: Yasmā pana te pariḷāhalīnattavikkhepā ekajjhaṃ na pavattanti,
tika-s0305t:382_10: Na ca vitakketi na ca vicāretīti kilesasahagate vitakkavicāre na pavatteti.
tika-s0305t:383_1: Yasmā hi imassa bhikkhuno taṃ mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ paripanthe sati ṭhapetvā buddhaguṇādianussaraṇena cittaṃ pasādetvā mūlakammaṭṭhānabhāvanā pavattā,
tika-s0305t:383_8: Sukheneva kilesānaṃ okāsaṃ adento antarā asajjanto alagganto.
tika-s0305t:388_0: 378. Dutiyavagge paṭhamasuttaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā suviññeyyanti taṃ laṅghitvā “dutiye”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:389_3: Sammā anavasesato bujjhati etenāti sambodhīti āha –
tika-s0305t:389_5: Nippadesā gahitāti anavasesā buddhaguṇā gahitā aggamaggasiddhiyāva bhagavato sabbaguṇānaṃ siddhattā.
tika-s0305t:389_7: atha kho aggasāvakapaccekabuddhānampi taṃtaṃguṇasamijjhanaṃ aggamaggādhigamenevāti dassento “dvepi aggasāvakā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t:390_1: pasannoti iminā pasādassa vattamānatā dīpitāti uppannasaddhoti imināpi saddhāya paccuppannatā pakāsitāti āha –
tika-s0305t:390_5: So eva atisayavacanicchāvasena bhiyyobhiññataroti vuttoti āha –
tika-s0305t:390_11: Svāyaṃ assa atisayo abhiññāya bhiyyobhāvakatoti āha –
tika-s0305t:390_20: nanu heṭṭhimānipi bhagavato maggañāṇāni savāsanameva yathāsakaṃ paṭipakkhavidhamanavasena pavattāni.
tika-s0305t:390_23: taṃ pana aparipuṇṇaṃ paṭipakkhavidhamanassa vippakatabhāvatoti āha “arahattamaggañāṇe vā”ti.
tika-s0305t:391_6: idha pana āsabhī viyāti āsabhī. Tenāha –
tika-s0305t:391_11: Vijjāṭṭhānādīsu kataparicayānaṃ ācariyānaṃ taṃ taṃ atthaṃ ñāpentī paveṇī ācariyaparamparā.
tika-s0305t:391_12: Kevalaṃ attano matiyā “iti kira evaṃ kirā”ti parikappanā itikirā.
tika-s0305t:391_13: Piṭakassa ganthassa sampadānato bhūtato tassa gahaṇaṃ piṭakasampadānaṃ.
tika-s0305t:391_16: Āgamādhigamehi vinā kevalaṃ anussutato takkamaggaṃ nissāya takkanaṃ takko.
tika-s0305t:391_18: Yasmā buddhavisaye ṭhatvā bhagavato ayaṃ therassa codanā therassa ca so avisayo,
tika-s0305t:392_1: Vimaddakkhamañhi sīhanādaṃ nadanto atthato anuyogaṃ sodheti nāma,
tika-s0305t:392_7: so eva tattha anuyogaṃ detīti yujjati.
tika-s0305t:393_0: Sabbe teti sabbe te atīte niruddhe sammāsambuddhe.
tika-s0305t:393_2: ye te ahesuṃ atītamaddhānaṃ tava abhinīhārato oraṃ sammāsambuddhā,
tika-s0305t:393_3: tesaṃ tāva sāvakañāṇagocare dhamme paricchindanto mārādayo viya ca buddhānaṃ lokiyacittācāraṃ tvaṃ jāneyyāsi.
tika-s0305t:393_5: tato parato chinnavaṭumā chinnapapañcā pariyādinnavaṭṭā sabbadukkhavītivattā sammāsambuddhā,
tika-s0305t:393_6: tesaṃ sabbesampi tava sāvakañāṇassa avisayabhūte dhamme kathaṃ jānissasīti.
tika-s0305t:393_9: Samādhipakkhāti samādhi ca samādhipakkhā ca samādhipakkhā ekadesasarūpekasesanayena.
tika-s0305t:393_10: Tattha samādhipakkhāti vīriyasatiyo tadanuguṇā ca dhammā veditabbā.
tika-s0305t:393_12: jhānasamāpattiyo samādhippadhānāti vuttaṃ “samādhipakkhānaṃ dhammānaṃ gahitattā vihāro gahito”ti.
tika-s0305t:394_0: Yathā pana heṭṭhā gahitāpi samādhipaññā paṭipakkhato vimuttattā vimuccana- saṅkhāta-
tika-s0305t:394_4: tasmā sabbesaṃ samāpattivihārānaṃ vasenettha attho yujjatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:394_8: Sabbakilesehi nissaṭattā asaṃsaṭṭhattā vimuttattā ca nissaraṇavimutti nibbānaṃ.
tika-s0305t:395_2: Tena atītesu tāva khandhānaṃ bhūtapubbattā tattha siyā ñāṇassa savisaye gati,
tika-s0305t:395_3: anāgatesu pana sabbaso asañjātesu kathanti imamatthaṃ joteti.
tika-s0305t:395_6: Nanu atītānāgate sattāhe eva pavattaṃ cittaṃ cetopariyañāṇassa visayo,
tika-s0305t:395_11: Viditaṭṭhāne na karoti sikkhāpadeneva tādisassa paṭikkhepassa paṭikkhittattā setughātato ca.
tika-s0305t:395_12: Kathaṃ pana thero dvayasambhave paṭikkhepameva akāsi,
tika-s0305t:395_22: Buddhasīlādayo hi buddhānaṃ buddhakiccassa parehi ete buddhāti jānanassa ca kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0305t:396_0: Anumānañāṇaṃ viya saṃsayaṭṭhitaṃ ahutvā idamidanti yathāsabhāvato ñeyyaṃ dhāreti nicchinotīti dhammo,
tika-s0305t:396_3: Paccakkhasiddhañhi atthaṃ anugantvā anumānañāṇassa pavatti “diṭṭhena adiṭṭhassa anumāna”nti veditabbā.
tika-s0305t:396_4: Vidite vedakampi ñāṇaṃ atthato viditameva hotīti “anumānañāṇaṃ nayaggāho vidito”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:396_11: Etena thero yaṃ yaṃ anumeyyamatthaṃ ñātukāmo hoti,
tika-s0305t:396_12: tattha tattha tassa asaṅgamappaṭihataṃ anumānañāṇaṃ pavattetīti dasseti.
tika-s0305t:397_4: Paṇḍitadovārikaṭṭhāniyaṃ katvā thero attānaṃ dassetīti dassento “ekadvāranti kasmā āhā”ti codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
tika-s0305t:398_0: Yassā paññāya vasena puriso paṇḍitoti vuccati,
tika-s0305t:398_6: Ṭhāne ṭhāne uppatti etissā atthīti ṭhānuppattikā,
tika-s0305t:398_13: So pana heṭṭhimantena dvinnampi iṭṭhakānaṃ vigamena evaṃ vuccatīti āha –
tika-s0305t:398_21: Uppannāya paññāya nīvaraṇehi na kiñci kātuṃ sakkāti āha “anuppannāya paññāya uppajjituṃ na dentī”ti.
tika-s0305t:398_23: Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suṭṭhu ṭhapitacittāti catubbidhāyapi satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya sammadeva ṭhapitacittā appitacittā.
tika-s0305t:398_24: Yathāsabhāvena bhāvetvāti yāthāvato sammadeva yathā paṭipakkhā samucchijjanti,
tika-s0305t:399_0: Purimanaye satipaṭṭhānāni bojjhaṅgā ca missakā adhippetāti tato aññathā vattuṃ “apicetthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:399_2: “Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittāti paṭhamaṃ vuttattā satipaṭṭhānesu vipassanaṃ gahetvā satta
tika-s0305t:399_3: bojjhaṅge yathābhūtaṃ bhāvetvāti vuttattā maggapariyāpannānaṃyeva ca nesaṃ nippariyāyabojjhaṅgabhāvato
