tika-s0305t:399_4: tesu ca adhigatameva hotīti bojjhaṅge maggo ca sabbaññutaññāṇañcāti gahite sundaro pañho bhaveyyā”ti
tika-s0305t:400_1: Nagaraṃ viya nibbānaṃ tadatthikehi upagantabbato upagatānañca parissayarahitasukhādhigamaṭṭhānato.
tika-s0305t:400_2: Pākāro viya sīlaṃ tadupagatānaṃ parito ārakkhabhāvato.
tika-s0305t:400_7: Paṇḍitadovāriko viya dhammasenāpati nibbānanagaraṃ paviṭṭhapavisanakānaṃ sattānaṃ sallakkhaṇato.
tika-s0305t:402_1: Pubbe sāvatthito veḷuvagāmassa gatattā vuttaṃ “āgatamaggeneva paṭinivattanto”ti.
tika-s0305t:402_7: Natthi nu khoti etthāpi “olokento”ti ānetvā sambandho sīhāvalokanañāyena.
tika-s0305t:402_8: Bhavissanti me vattāro harituṃ nāsakkhīti sambandho.
tika-s0305t:402_10: na tattha sālayatādassanaṃ yathā tathāgatassa vesāliyā nikkhamitvā nāgāpalokitaṃ.
tika-s0305t:403_0: Tassa tassa visesassa adhiṭṭhānavaseneva iddhibhedadassanaṃ iddhivikubbanaṃ.
tika-s0305t:403_1: Sīhassa vijambhanādivasena kīḷitvā nādasadisī ayaṃ dhammakathāti vuttaṃ “sīhavikīḷito dhammapariyāyo”ti.
tika-s0305t:403_4: Tena therena yathārambhassa vacanapabandhassa samāpitabhāvaṃ joteti.
tika-s0305t:403_9: saddo na sakkomīti ettha ānetvā sambandhitabbo.
tika-s0305t:404_1: Patthanākāle anomadassissa bhagavato vacanasutānusārena ñāṇena diṭṭhamattataṃ sandhāya “taṃ paṭhamadassana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:404_3: Esa maggoti eso jātānaṃ sattānaṃ maraṇaniṭṭhito pantho.
tika-s0305t:404_4: Punapi evaṃbhāvino nāma saṅkhārāti saṅkhārā nāma evaṃbhāvino,
tika-s0305t:405_1: Yasmā dhammasenāpatino arahattappattadivaseyeva satthu sāvakasannipāto ahosi,
tika-s0305t:407_5: parehi saddhiṃ saṃvibhajanavasena pavattaṃ dhammasambhoganti desanādhammameva vadati.
tika-s0305t:408_7: So bhijjeyyāti so mahantataro khandho bhijjeyya.
tika-s0305t:409_1: Mahākhandho viyāti mahanto sāravanto sākhākhandho viya.
tika-s0305t:415_7: Jātiyā khayo vaṭṭadukkhassa antabhūtoti jātikkhayanto, nibbānaṃ,
tika-s0305t:415_8: taṃ diṭṭhattā jātikkhayantadassīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0305t:417_1: Ayaṃ tassa laddhīti ayaṃ idāni vuccamānā tassa ācariyassa laddhi.
tika-s0305t:417_4: Tathā namanto hi patitvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ hoti.
tika-s0305t:417_7: Ākaḍḍhento viyāti namitaṭṭhānato parabhāgena ākaḍḍhento viya.
tika-s0305t:417_8: Ekatobhāgiyaṃ katvāti yathāvuttaṃ satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā onataṃ viya katvā.
tika-s0305t:417_9: Tathā karaṇaṃ pana tathā vātūpatthambhagāhāpanenāti āha –
tika-s0305t:417_11: Tañca satiyā tadatthaṃ upaṭṭhānenāti vuttaṃ “satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā”ti.
tika-s0305t:417_14: “Ācariyo vaṃsaṃ suggahitaṃ gaṇhanto”tiādi sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
tika-s0305t:418_0: “Attānameva rakkhatī”ti idaṃ attano rakkhaṇaṃ padhānaṃ katvā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0305t:418_2: Attarakkhāya panettha sijjhamānāya antevāsikarakkhāpi siddhā eva hotīti.
tika-s0305t:418_4: So tattha ñāyoti yā attano eva rakkhā,
tika-s0305t:418_5: sā atthato pararakkhāpi hotīti ayamettha ñāyo yuttappayogo.
tika-s0305t:418_9: Āsevanāyātiādīni padāni anudayatāpariyosānāni (yasmā satipaṭṭhānaṃ sevantassa siddhaṃ attano ca parassa ca rakkhaṇaṃ pakāsenti, tasmā) – “attānaṃ,
tika-s0305t:420_1: Janapadasmiṃ kalyāṇīti sakalajanapade bhaddā rūpasampattiyā sikkhāsampattiyā ca sundarā seṭṭhā.
tika-s0305t:420_2: Rūpasampatti ca nāma sabbaso rūpadosābhāvena rūpaguṇapāripūriyā hotīti tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ “chasarīradosarahitā pañcakalyāṇasamannāgatā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:420_5: Nātidīghā nātirassāti pamāṇamajjhimā dīghatarappamāṇā na hoti,
tika-s0305t:420_8: Nātikisāti ativiya kisathaddhamaṃsalohitā dissamānā aṭṭhisarīrā jālasarīrā na hoti.
tika-s0305t:420_10: Nātikāḷā nāccodātāti ativiya kāḷavaṇṇā jhāmaṅgāro viya,
tika-s0305t:420_12: Manussaloke tādisiyā rūpasampattiyā abhāvato atikkantā manussavaṇṇaṃ.
tika-s0305t:420_14: evaṃ ārohapariṇāhayogato ca paresaṃ pasādāvahā nātidīghatādayo.
tika-s0305t:420_16: Ettha ca nātidīghanātirassatāvacanena ārohasampatti vuttā ubbedhena pāsādikabhāvato.
tika-s0305t:421_5: Te vā vīsatiyāsūtiraṃ dhānappattiyā pavattiyā pavattimakatamandatā vibhāvasuṭatassa uttamameva gītañca
tika-s0305t:421_6: gāyatīti attho.) [Etthantare pāṭho asuddho dussodhanīyo ca.
tika-s0305t:421_7: Suddhapāṭho gavesitabbo.] Samatittiko telapattoti mukhavattisamaṃ telānaṃ pūritattā samatittikamukhaṃ telabhājanaṃ.
tika-s0305t:421_8: Antarena ca mahāsamajjaṃ antarena ca janapadakalyāṇinti janapadakalyāṇiyā,
tika-s0305t:421_9: tassā ca naccagītaṃ pekkhituṃ sannipatitamahājanasamūhassa majjhato pariharitabbo netabbo.
tika-s0305t:425_2: Tañhi sīlanaṭṭhena ekavidhampi cārittādivasena anekavidhaṃ. Tenāha –
tika-s0305t:425_4: Pañhamaggoti ñātuṃ icchitassa atthassa vīmaṃsanaṃ. Tenāha –
tika-s0305t:429_1: Padesato bhāvitattāti ekadesato bhāvitattā bhāvanāpāripūriyā ananuppattattā. Tenāha –
tika-s0305t:433_3: “Satatavihāravasena vutta”nti vatvā tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “thero kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:433_6: Anubandhati cakkavāḷānaṃ sahassaṃ ekāvajjaneneva sahassalokadhātuyā icchitamatthaṃ jānituṃ samatthoti dasseti.
tika-s0305t:436_1: Yā vedanā sammasitvāti yā tebhūmakavedanā sammasitvā.
tika-s0305t:436_2: Tāvassāti tā tebhūmakavedanā eva assa bhikkhuno.
tika-s0305t:436_8: saññā diṭṭhipapañcassa mūlavasena sammasanaṃ vuttā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0305t:440_0: 408. Sārammaṇasatipaṭṭhānāti ārammaṇalakkhitā satipaṭṭhānā kathitā, na satilakkhaṇā.
tika-s0305t:442_0: 410. Suddhikaṃ katvā visuṃ visuṃ katvā. Tathā ca vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “kāye vā bhikkhū”ti.
tika-s0305t:444_4: Tattha pātimokkhasaṃvarova sīlanti avadhāraṇaṃ itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ekadesena pātimokkhantogadhabhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0305t:444_5: Tathā hi anolokiyolokane ājīvahetu ca chasikkhāpadavītikkamane gilānapaccayassa appaccavekkhitaparibhoge ca āpatti vihitāti.
tika-s0305t:444_7: Sīlanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthīti sīlapariyāyena tesaṃ katthaci sutte gahitaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthīti nippariyāyasīlataṃ tesaṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-s0305t:444_12: Idamatthanti idaṃ payojanaṃ imassa paccayassa paribhuñjaneti adhippāyo.
tika-s0305t:444_13: Nippariyāyenāti iminā indriyasaṃvarādīni tīṇi padhānasīlassa paripālanaparisodhanavasena pavattiyā pariyāyasīlāni nāmāti dasseti.
tika-s0305t:444_14: Idāni pātimokkhasīlasseva padhānabhāvaṃ byatirekato anvayato ca upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yassā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t:445_0: Ācārena ca gocarena ca sampannoti kāyikacetasikaavītikkamasaṅkhātena ācārena ca navesiyādigocaratādisaṅkhātena gocarena ca sampanno,
tika-s0305t:445_5: Te pana ekantato akusalā hontīti āha –
tika-s0305t:445_8: paramāṇumattampi vajjaṃ sineruppamāṇaṃ viya katvā dassanasīlo.
tika-s0305t:445_9: Sammā ādiyitvāti sammadeva sakkaccaṃ sabbaso ca ādiyitvā.
tika-s0305t:445_10: Sikkhāpadesūti niddhāraṇe bhummanti samudāyato avayavaniddhāraṇaṃ dassento “sikkhāpadesu taṃ taṃ sikkhāpada”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0305t:445_20: Imasmiṃ atthavikappe sikkhāpadesūti ādhāre bhummaṃ sikkhābhāgesu kassaci visuṃ aggahaṇato. Tenāha –
tika-s0305t:445_22: “Tato tvaṃ bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāyā”ti vacanato anabhijjhā abyāpādasammādiṭṭhiyopi sīlanti vuttā,
tika-s0305t:447_1: Etthāpi manosucaritaṃ sīlaṃ nāmāti dassetīti katvā vuttaṃ “pacchimāpi tayo”ti.
tika-s0305t:447_2: Anabhijjhāabyāpādasammādiṭṭhidhammā sīlaṃ hotīti veditabbā kāyavacīsucaritehi saddhiṃ manosucaritampi
tika-s0305t:447_3: vatvā “tato tvaṃ bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāyā”ti vuttattā.
tika-s0305t:447_7: Vaggapeyyālato pana imasmiṃ satipaṭṭhānasaṃyutte katipayavaggā saṅgahaṃ ārūḷhā,
tika-s0305t:447_8: tathāpi tesaṃ atthavisesābhāvato ekaccesu potthakesu mukhamattaṃ dassetvā saṃkhittā,
tika-s0305t:453_6: vasenāti catubhūmakadhammaparicchedavasena ceva kusalādīhi sabbasaṅgāhakadhammaparicchedavasena ca vuttanti attho.
tika-s0305t:455_3: Samudayasaccavasenāti taṇhāvijjādiṃ saddhindriyassa samudayasaccabhāvena na pajānanti.
tika-s0305t:456_2: Tasmā paṭhamuppannā saddhā eva hettha “āvajjana”nti vuttā,
tika-s0305t:456_5: Tasmā paṭhamuppannā āvajjanā paggahuppattiṭṭhānānaṃ tikkhānaṃ vīriyindriyādīnaṃ paṭhamuppattiyā āvajjanapariyāyena vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:456_6: Dubbalā hi paṭhamuppannā paggahābhāvato vīriyindriyādīnaṃ samudayoti balavabhāvappattavīriyindriyādikassa
tika-s0305t:456_8: pubbe adhimuccanādivasena pavattassa āvajjanassa samudayāti attho.
tika-s0305t:456_9: Puna chandavasenāti kattukāmatākusalacchandavasena saddhādīnaṃ uppādetukāmatākārappavattassa chandassa vasena.
tika-s0305t:456_10: Manasikāravasena āvajjanasamudayāti saddhindriyādivasena pavattassa dubbalassa tassa nibbattakayonisomanasikāravasena āvajjanassa uppattiyā.
tika-s0305t:456_12: Chasu suttesūti dutiyato paṭṭhāya chasu suttesu.
tika-s0305t:458_6: Tāni pana tīsu ṭhānesu saddhā ariyakantasīlañcāti veditabbāni.
tika-s0305t:458_11: Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāhi vibhāvetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:458_18: Evañca katvā “sotāpattiyaṅgāni patvā”ti idañca vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0305t:458_20: Ariyasaccāni patvāti cattāri saccāni abhisametabbāni pāpuṇitvā.
tika-s0305t:460_5: tassa bhāvo nepakkanti satiyāpi nepakkabhāvo yujjateva.
tika-s0305t:460_7: satiyā ca nepakkenāti evaṃ vuccamānena satiniddeso nāma kato hotiyeva.
tika-s0305t:460_8: Asukaṃ nāma suttaṃ vā kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā me bhāsitanti.
tika-s0305t:460_9: Vossajjīyati saṅkhāragataṃ etasmiṃ adhigateti vossaggo, nibbānaṃ.
tika-s0305t:460_12: Gacchantiyāti saṅkhārānaṃ udayañca vayañca udayabbayaṃ gacchantiyā bujjhantiyā.
tika-s0305t:460_18: so anuppannāna”ntiādinā ca vuttattā vīriyindriyaṃ missakaṃ.
tika-s0305t:464_3: Yathā vīriyindriyaniddese “cattāro sammappadhāne ārabbha vīriyaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti desanā āgatā,
tika-s0305t:464_4: evaṃ satindriyaniddese “cattāro satipaṭṭhāne ārabbha satiṃ paṭilabhatī”ti,
tika-s0305t:466_1: Indriyānaṃ tikkhādibhāvo vipassanāvasena vā maggavasena vā phalavasena vā gahetabboti vuttaṃ “tatoti…pe…
tika-s0305t:466_3: Nanu cettha mudubhāvo eva pāḷiyaṃ gahitoti?
tika-s0305t:466_5: taṃ pana tikkhabhāve asati na hoti tikkhādibhāvoti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:466_7: ito taṃ tikkhanti vattabbataṃ labhati apekkhāsiddhattā tikkhamudubhāvānaṃ pārāpāraṃ viya.
tika-s0305t:466_8: Idāni “tato”tiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “samattānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:466_15: “tato mudutarānī”ti vuttapaṭhamamaggo dhammānusārī vā siyā saddhānusārī vāti byabhicarati?
tika-s0305t:466_18: Yo hi sotāpanno hutvā iriyāpathaṃ akopetvā yathānisinnova sakadāgāmimaggaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-s0305t:466_21: Yo pana sotāpanno hutvā kālantarena sakadāgāmī hoti,
tika-s0305t:466_22: tassa sotāpattimaggatthāya pavattāni vipassanindriyāni nāma honti.
tika-s0305t:466_24: tassa yathāvuttavipassanindriyato mudutarānīti “tato mudutarāni dhammānusārīmaggassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:466_26: Dhammānusārīvipassanindriyato saddhānusārīvipassanindriyānaṃ mudubhāvassa kāraṇaṃ sayameva vakkhati.
tika-s0305t:467_0: Evaṃ vipassanāvasena dassetvā maggavasena dassetuṃ “tathā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0305t:468_2: tasmā te dvepi idha tatiyavāre na labbhantīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0305t:468_3: Dhammānusārīsaddhānusārīnaṃ nānattaṃ kathaṃ jātanti āha “āgamanenapi maggenapī”ti.
tika-s0305t:469_4: Dhammānusārīpuggalo hi āgamanamhi kilese vikkhambhento appadukkhena appakasirena akilamantova vikkhambhetuṃ sakkoti.
tika-s0305t:469_5: Saddhānusārīpuggalo pana dukkhena kasirena kilamanto hutvā vikkhambhetuṃ sakkoti,
tika-s0305t:469_6: tasmā dhammānusārissa pubbabhāgamaggakkhaṇe kilesacchedakañāṇaṃ adandhaṃ tikhiṇaṃ hutvā vahati,
tika-s0305t:469_7: yathā nāma tikhiṇena asinā kadaliṃ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṃ maṭṭhaṃ hoti,
tika-s0305t:469_12: saddhānusārino pana pubbabhāgakkhaṇe kilesacchedakañāṇaṃ dandhaṃ na tikhiṇaṃ asūraṃ hutvā vahati,
tika-s0305t:469_13: yathā nāma nātitikhiṇena asinā kadaliṃ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṃ na maṭṭhaṃ hoti,
tika-s0305t:469_20: Avasesā ca kilesā khīyanti saṃyojanakkhayāya yogattā.
tika-s0305t:473_1: Sīlakkhandhādīhi saddhindriyādīhi ca parito pūraṇena paripūraṃ arahattamaggaṃ karonto nipphattito arahattaphalaṃ ārādheti nipphādeti.
tika-s0305t:473_2: Tayo padesamaggeti sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ apāripūriyā ekadesabhūte tayo heṭṭhimamagge.
tika-s0305t:473_4: Catūsūti imasmiṃ vagge paṭhamādīsu catūsu suttesu.
tika-s0305t:473_8: “catūsupi suttesu missakāneva indriyāni kathitānī”ti pana vacanato vipassanāvasenapi yojanā labbhatevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:475_3: imasmiṃ sutte sabbasova vipassanindriyānaṃ eva adhippetattā.
tika-s0305t:475_4: Idāni tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “paripuṇṇāni hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:475_5: Avihādīsu pañcasu suddhāvāsesu tattha tattha āyuvemajjhaṃ anatikkamitvā antarā kilesaparinibbānena parinibbāyanato antarāparinibbāyī,
tika-s0305t:475_8: uddhaṃ vāhibhāvena uddhamassa taṇhāsotaṃ vaṭṭasotaṃ vāti uddhaṃsoto,
tika-s0305t:475_9: uddhaṃ vā gantvā paṭilabhitabbato uddhamassa maggasotanti uddhaṃsoto,
tika-s0305t:475_10: akaniṭṭhabhavaṃ gacchatīti akaniṭṭhagāmīti evamettha saddattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0305t:476_3: Pañca nissakkāni nīharitabbānīti “tato mudutarehi antarāparinibbāyī hotī”tiādīni pañca nissakkāni niddhāretvā kathetabbāni.
tika-s0305t:476_5: Tattha avihādīsu uppajjitvā uppannasamanantarāya parinibbāyanato paṭhamaantarāparinibbāyī.
tika-s0305t:476_7: āyuvemajjhaṃ patvā parinibbāyanato tato paraṃ tatiyaantarāparinibbāyī veditabbo.
tika-s0305t:476_10: Na vattabbanti dassento āha “asaṅkhāraparinibbāyissa sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyinopi eteva pañca janā”ti.
tika-s0305t:477_0: Tīṇi nissakkānīti “tato mudutarehi sotāpanno hotī”tiādīni tīṇi nissakkapadāni.
tika-s0305t:477_5: mudutarānīti idaṃ sakadāgāmimaggassa vipassanindriyehi ekabījisaṅkhātasotāpannavipassanindriyāni mudutarāni hontīti tīṇi katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:477_9: Chaṭṭhasattamāni vuttanayānevāti chaṭṭhasattamāni suttāni dutiyatatiyesu vuttanayāneva.
tika-s0305t:479_3: Aṭṭhahīti catūhi phalehi catūhi ca maggehīti aṭṭhahi.
tika-s0305t:485_7: Imesu hi upādinnaindriyesu sati vaṭṭaṃ vattati paññāyati.
tika-s0305t:487_10: tasmā taṃ kiccaṃ sesadhammesupi samāropetvā vuttaṃ “aññātāvīsu arahattaphaladhammesū”ti.
tika-s0305t:489_3: Tīṇi nissakkāni evamidha pañca nissakkāni nīharitabbāni ekabījiādivibhāvanato.
tika-s0305t:489_5: Sotāpattimaggassa vipassanindriyāni nāma tenattabhāvena sakadāgāmimaggaṃ pattuṃ gacchantassa sotāpannassa vipassanindriyāni.
tika-s0305t:489_6: Pañcapi te sotāpattimaggassa bhedāyevāti “sakadāgāmimagge ṭhatvā nīharitabbānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:490_1: Yassa hi sotāpannassa ekaṃ khandhabījaṃ atthi,
tika-s0305t:490_8: Ettakañhi pamāṇaṃ gato sattakkhattuparamo nāma hoti,
tika-s0305t:490_10: ettakaṃ ekabījīti bhagavatā etesaṃ nāmaṃ gahitaṃ.
tika-s0305t:491_0: Dve tayo bhaveti devamanussesu eva dve tayo bhave.
tika-s0305t:491_1: Sambodhicatusaccadhammo paraṃ ayanaṃ nissayo gati etassāti sambodhiparāyaṇo.
tika-s0305t:491_3: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyato paṭṭhāya hi nīcakule uppatti nāma natthi,
tika-s0305t:491_7: Dve vā tīṇi vā kulānīti devamanussavasena dve vā tayo vā bhaveti ayampi missakabhavena kathito.
tika-s0305t:491_8: Jātassa kumārassa viya ariyāya jātiyā jātassa nāmametaṃ,
tika-s0305t:491_9: yadidaṃ niyatoti sattakkhattuparamādikoti ca samaññāti dassento āha “bhagavatā gahitanāmavasenevā”tiādi.
tika-s0305t:492_0: Yadi pubbahetuniyamato sotāpanno ca niyatoti sotāpattimaggato uddhaṃ tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ upanissayābhāvato
tika-s0305t:492_3: tāva niyamato sotāpattimagguppattito pubbe eva niyamito,
tika-s0305t:492_8: Niyamato sotāpanno ca niyatoti paṭhamamaggādhigameneva anukkamena upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ kiccāni nipphajjanti,
tika-s0305t:492_9: evaṃ sattakkhattuparamatādiniyame sati sattamabhavādito uddhaṃ pavattatāya dukkhassa mūlabhūtā kilesā
tika-s0305t:492_10: paṭhamamaggeneva khīṇāti upari tayo maggā akiccā siyuṃ.
tika-s0305t:493_0: Yadi upari tayo maggā sattakkhattuparamāditaṃ niyamenti,
tika-s0305t:493_1: tato ca añño sotāpanno natthīti sotāpattimaggassa akiccakatā nippayojanatā āpajjeyya.
tika-s0305t:493_5: yāva uparimaggā eva hontīti sattabhavādito uddhamapavattanato tena vinānena sakkāyadiṭṭhiādippahānena ca tena vinā bhavitabbanti āha –
tika-s0305t:493_6: “paṭhamamagge anuppanneva upari tayo maggā uppannāti āpajjatī”ti.
tika-s0305t:493_8: Vipassanā niyametīti yujjatīti vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto “sace hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t:494_2: Idhaṭṭhakavokiṇṇasukkhavipassakassāti yo imasmiṃ kāmabhave ṭhito manussadevavasena vokiṇṇabhavūpapattiko sukkhavipassako ca,
tika-s0305t:495_0: Sodhessāmīti jambudīpe kenaci tepiṭakena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ piṭakattayameva mayhaṃ uggahaparipucchāvasena sodheyyāmīti paratīraṃ jambudīpaṃ gato.
tika-s0305t:495_2: Aniccānupassanādīsu ekamukhena abhiniviṭṭhenapi abhidhammapariyāyena tīhi eva vimokkhehi maggaṃ labhatīti
tika-s0305t:495_4: tathā tayo appaṇihitato vuṭṭhitāti cha honti,
tika-s0305t:495_7: tayo antarāparinibbāyino eko upahaccaparinibbāyī eko uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti pañca,
tika-s0305t:495_8: te asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāraparinibbāyibhedena dasāti avihādīsu catūsupi cattālīsa,
tika-s0305t:495_9: akaniṭṭhe pana uddhaṃsoto natthīti aṭṭhacattālīsa anāgāmino.
tika-s0305t:497_2: evaṃ taṃdvārikadhammesupi adhipateyyaṃ tehi anuvattanīyattāti vuttaṃ –
tika-s0305t:503_4: Sādanīyaṭṭhena dhammapadāni attani assādayatīti sātaṃ, madhuraṃ.
tika-s0305t:505_2: Kiñci dvayaṃ saṅghaṭṭitamattaṃ hutvā na samodhānagataṃ hotīti taṃnivattanatthaṃ “saṅghaṭṭanasamodhānā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:505_4: Adharāraṇī viya vatthārammaṇaṃ asatipi vāyāme tajjasamphassapaccayato.
tika-s0305t:505_6: Saṅghaṭṭo viya phassasaṅghaṭṭanaṃ araṇidvayasaṅghaṭṭanā viya phassasseva vatthārammaṇesu saṅghaṭṭanākārena pavattito.
tika-s0305t:505_8: Vatthārammaṇaṃ vā uttarāraṇī viya indhanāpātagahaṇādīsu ussāhassa viya pavattisambhavato.
tika-s0305t:507_7: Adesitattāti sesasuttāni viya “sukhindriya”ntiādinā adesitattā idaṃ uppaṭipāṭikasuttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0305t:509_1: Dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ upacārakkhaṇe eva nirujjhantīti ānetvā sambandho.
tika-s0305t:509_12: Pītisamuṭṭhānānaṃ vā paṇītarūpānaṃ kāyassa byāpanato vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:509_18: “Tassa mayhaṃ aticiraṃ vitakkayato vicārayato kāyopi kilami,
tika-s0305t:509_19: cittampi vihaññī”ti ca vacanato kāyacittakhedānaṃ vitakkavicārapaccayatā veditabbā.
tika-s0305t:509_21: Tatthassa siyā uppattīti tattha dutiyajjhānupacāre assa domanassassa uppatti bhaveyya.
tika-s0305t:509_22: “Tatthassa siyā uppattī”ti idaṃ parikappavacanaṃ upacārakkhaṇe domanassassa suppahīnabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0305t:509_23: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “na tveva dutiyajjhāne pahīnapaccayattā”ti.
tika-s0305t:509_24: Pahīnampi somanassindriyaṃ pīti viya na dūreti katvā “āsannattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:509_25: Nānāvajjanupacāre pahīnampi pahānaṅgaṃ paṭipakkhena avihatattā antarantarā uppajjeyyāti imamatthaṃ dassento “appanāppattāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t:509_26: “Tādisāya āsevanāya icchitabbattā yathā maggavīthito pubbe dve tayo javanavārā sadisānupassanāva pavattanti,
tika-s0305t:509_27: evamidhāpi appanāvārato pubbe dve tayo javanavārā upekkhāsahagatāva pavattantī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0305t:510_1: Sā panassa uppādanena vā uppannassa samāpajjanena vā hotīti vuttaṃ “uppādanatthāya samāpajjanatthāyā”ti.
tika-s0305t:514_4: Kiṃ pana bhagavato vajirasāraṃ sarīraṃ otāpetabbaṃ hotīti āha –
tika-s0305t:514_7: Na sakkoti byāmappabhāya kāyaci pabhāya anabhibhavanīyattā.
tika-s0305t:514_9: ghammasabhāvatāya pana rasmīnaṃ parito pharantī sūriyābhā tikhiṇā uṇhāti āha “rasmiteja”nti.
tika-s0305t:514_10: Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yatheva hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:515_0: Suvaṇṇāvaṭṭaṃ viyāti acche suvaṇṇapatte vinivattaāvaṭṭaṃ viya.
tika-s0305t:515_5: Evarūpaṃ na hotīti aññesaṃ pākatikasattānaṃ vuttākāraṃ viya na hoti puññasambhārassa uḷāratamattā vipaccanassa pariyantagatattā.
tika-s0305t:515_10: Purato vaṅkoti thokaṃ purato natamattaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0305t:517_3: Idāni taṃ aññavisayataṃ anvayato byatirekato vibhāvetuṃ “sace hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:518_1: Indriyaviññāṇāni hi asatipi tādise adhippāye attano ārammaṇassa yāthāvato sampajānanato pavedanavijānanāni karontāni viya pavattanti,
tika-s0305t:518_5: manova nesaṃ gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhotī”ti manodvārikajavanamano hi savisesaṃ manovisayaṃ paccanubhoti,
tika-s0305t:520_1: Bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa hi javanamano ussakkitvāva maggasatiṃ paṭisarati tappariyosānattā.
tika-s0305t:520_6: Ārammaṇavasena natthi etassa paṭisaraṇanti appaṭisaraṇaṃ asaṅkhatāmatassa santiniccasabhāvattā.
tika-s0305t:520_10: Na tato paraṃ gacchati gatassa aññassa tādisassa abhāvā.
tika-s0305t:521_3: Maggo daḷhāya asaṃhāriyasaddhāya mūlaṃ diṭṭhisampayuttāni ceva vicikicchācittañcāti pañca akusalacittāni samucchedavasena pahīnāni.
tika-s0305t:521_4: Pañca nīvaraṇānīti ettha apāyagamanīyāni paṭhamamaggeneva pahīnāni,
tika-s0305t:521_5: itarāni vikkhambhanavasena jhānena pahīnānīti pañcasu orambhāgiyakilesasaṃyojanesu ekadesavigameneva
tika-s0305t:523_1: Pubbakoṭṭhake evaṃ āgatasuttaṃ ādiṃ katvā phalindriyāneva kathitāni aggaphalavasena desanāya āgatattā.
tika-s0305t:525_1: Upari saha vipassanāya tayo maggāti vipassanāya saha sotāpattiphalato upari tayo maggā.
tika-s0305t:525_2: Maggādhigamena idāni paccakkhabhūtattā “ime kho te dhammā”ti vuttā.
tika-s0305t:525_4: tassa vasena dassetuṃ “arahattaphalindriyaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ indriyabhāvasāmaññena ekajjhaṃ katvā.
tika-s0305t:531_1: Cattāri indriyānīti paññindriyaṃ ṭhapetvā sesāni cattāri.
tika-s0305t:531_3: saddo pana yathā tathā visuddhepi hotīti tādisaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “tampi panā”tiādi.
tika-s0305t:531_5: evaṃ paññindriyampi missakanti vuccamāne na koci virodhoti adhippāyenāha “tampi pana…pe…
tika-s0305t:533_4: Na hi ariyāpi anadhigataṃ maggaphalaṃ paccavekkhituṃ sakkonti.
tika-s0305t:537_3: Bhāvanapuṃsakanti bhāvajotakaṃ napuṃsakavacanaṃ yathā “visamaṃ vātā vāyanti,
tika-s0305t:540_10: “Dvinnaṃ phalānaṃ aññataraṃ phala”nti evaṃ atītasutte vuttāni heṭṭhā dve phalāni nāmāti vadanti.
tika-s0305t:540_11: Yehi pana indriyehi aññatra pana antarāparinibbāyiṃ sesāni phalāni honti,
tika-s0305t:540_12: tāni cattāri sapubbabhāgāni lokuttarānīti vuttaṃ siyā.
tika-s0305t:551_1: Chandaṃ nissāya pavatto samādhīti kattukamyatāchandaṃ adhipatiṃ katvā paṭiladdhasamādhi chandhasamādhi.
tika-s0305t:551_5: ijjhanti etāya saddhā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iminā vā pariyāyena “iddhī”ti saṅkhātānaṃ upacārajjhānādikusalacittasampayuttānaṃ
tika-s0305t:551_8: Sā eva ca yathāvuttaiddhi yasmā heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā uparimāya uparimāya pādabhūtā,
tika-s0305t:551_11: Tattha hi vīriyaṃ cittaṃ vīmaṃsaṃ adhipatiṃ katvā paṭiladdhasamādhi vīmaṃsāsamādhīti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0305t:553_0: 817. Iddhipadesanti iddhiyā ekadesaṃ. Ko pana soti āha – “tayo ca magge tīṇi ca phalānī”ti.
tika-s0305t:555_1: Samattanti sāmaññassa samaṃ attanaṃ ijjhanaṃ samattaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ.
tika-s0305t:555_2: Vivaṭṭapādakā eva iddhipādā kathitā “apārā pāraṃ gamanāya saṃvattantī”tiādivacanato.
tika-s0305t:557_1: Udenayakkhassa cetiyaṭṭhāneti udenassa nāma yakkhassa devāyatanasaṅkhepena iṭṭhakāhi kate mahājanassa cittīkataṭṭhāne.
tika-s0305t:557_7: Punappunaṃ katāti bhāvanāya bahulīkaraṇavasena aparāparaṃ pavattitā ānītā.
tika-s0305t:557_8: Yuttayānaṃ viya katāti yathā yuttamājaññayānaṃ chekena sārathinā adhiṭṭhitaṃ yathāruci pavattimarahati,
tika-s0305t:557_11: Vatthu viya katāti sabbaso upakkilesavisodhanena iddhivisesānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato suvisodhitaparissayavatthu viya katā.
tika-s0305t:557_15: Suṭṭhu samāraddhāti iddhibhāvanāya sikhappattiyā sammadeva saṃsevitā.
tika-s0305t:558_3: Tasseva gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ brahmajālavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:558_4: Mahāsīvatthero pana mahābodhisattānaṃ carimabhave paṭisandhidāyino kammassa asaṅkheyyāyukatāsaṃvattanasamatthataṃ
tika-s0305t:558_5: hadaye ṭhapetvā buddhānaṃ āyusaṅkhārassa parissayavikkhambhanasamatthatā pāḷiyaṃ āgatā evāti imaṃ bhaddakappameva
tika-s0305t:559_0: Khaṇḍiccādīhi abhisuyyatīti etena yathā iddhibalena jarāya na paṭighāto,
tika-s0305t:559_1: evaṃ tena maraṇassapi na paṭighātoti atthato āpannamevāti.
tika-s0305t:559_3: kvacani patito”ti aññathā vuṭṭhitenapi theravādena aṭṭhakathāvacanameva samatthitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:560_0: Pariyuṭṭhitacittoti yathā kiñci atthānatthaṃ sallakkhetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-s0305t:560_2: So pana abhibhavo mahatā udakoghena appakassa udakassa ajjhottharaṇaṃ viya ahosīti vuttaṃ “ajjhotthaṭacitto”ti.
tika-s0305t:560_4: ariyehi vā añño yo koci paro puthujjano.
tika-s0305t:560_5: Puthujjanaggahaṇañcettha yathā sabbena sabbaṃ appahīnavipallāso mārena pariyuṭṭhitacitto kiñci atthānatthaṃ sallakkhetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0305t:560_6: evaṃ thero bhagavatā kataṃ nimittobhāsaṃ sabbaso na sallakkhesīti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0305t:560_12: Tenāti yadipi itare aṭṭha vipallāsā pahīnā,
tika-s0305t:561_1: aññathā tena maddite sattānaṃ maraṇameva siyā,
tika-s0305t:561_4: Nanu esa aggasāvakassa mahiddhikassa mahānubhāvassa kucchiṃ paviṭṭhoti?
tika-s0305t:561_8: Vibādhanādhippāyena pana idha “kiṃ sakkhissatī”ti vuttaṃ hadayamaddanassa adhikatattā.
tika-s0305t:561_9: Nimittobhāsanti ettha “tiṭṭhatu bhagavā kappa”nti sakalakappaṃ avaṭṭhānayācanāya “yassa kassaci, ānanda,
tika-s0305t:561_10: cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā”tiādinā aññāpadesena attano caturiddhipādabhāvanānubhāvena kappaṃ avaṭṭhānasamatthatāvasena saññuppādanaṃ nimittaṃ.
tika-s0305t:561_11: Tathā pana pariyāyaggahaṇaṃ muñcitvā ujukaṃyeva attano adhippāyavibhāvanaṃ obhāso.
tika-s0305t:561_13: Attano aparādhahetuko sattānaṃ soko tanuko hoti,
tika-s0305t:561_16: Kiṃ pana thero mārena pariyuṭṭhitacittakāle pavattiṃ pacchā jānātīti?
tika-s0305t:562_1: virāgavibandhanena vā jātinimittatāya tattha tattha jātaṃ mārento viya hotīti “māretīti māro”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:562_5: Sattānaṃ anatthāvahaṃ paṭipattiṃ na muñcatīti namuci.
tika-s0305t:562_8: Sattamasattāhato paraṃ satta ahāni sandhāyāha “aṭṭhame sattāhe”ti,
tika-s0305t:562_9: na pana pallaṅkasattāhādi viya niyatakiccassa aṭṭhamasattāhassa nāma labbhanato.
tika-s0305t:562_10: Sattamasattāhassa hi parato ajapālanigrodhamūle brahmuno sakkassa ca paṭiññātadhammadesanaṃ bhagavantaṃ
tika-s0305t:562_11: ñatvā “idāni satte dhammadesanāya mama visayaṃ atikkāmessatī”ti sañjātadomanasso hutvā ṭhito cintesi,
tika-s0305t:562_14: mama manoratho ijjhissatī”ti cintetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito –
tika-s0305t:562_19: Bhagavā cassa atibandhanādhippāyaṃ jānantopi taṃ anāvikatvā parinibbānassa akālabhāvameva pakāsento yācanaṃ paṭikkhipi.
tika-s0305t:563_1: Tatheva vinītāti maggavasena kilesānaṃ samucchedavinayena vinītā.
tika-s0305t:563_2: Tathā visāradāti ariyamaggādhigameneva satthusāsane vesārajjappattiyā visāradā,
tika-s0305t:563_3: sārajjakarānaṃ diṭṭhivicikicchādipāpadhammānaṃ vigamena visāradabhāvaṃ pattāti attho.
tika-s0305t:563_4: Yassa sutassa vasena vaṭṭadukkhato nissaraṇaṃ sambhavati,
tika-s0305t:563_10: Tadevāti yaṃ taṃ tepiṭakaṃ sotabbabhāvena sutanti vuttaṃ, tameva.
tika-s0305t:563_12: Dhārentīti suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasaṃ viya avinassantaṃ katvā suppaguṇasuppavattibhāvena dhārenti hadaye ṭhapenti.
tika-s0305t:563_13: Iti pariyattidhammavasena bahussutadhammadharabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni paṭivedhavasenapi taṃ dassento “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:563_26: Attano ācariyavādanti attano ācariyassa sammāsambuddhassa vādaṃ.
tika-s0305t:564_10: Uttānīkarissantīti anuttānaṃ gambhīraṃ uttānaṃ pākaṭaṃ karissanti.
tika-s0305t:564_12: saddo kāraṇapariyāyo “hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”tiādīsu viyāti āha “sahetukena sakāraṇena vacanenā”ti.
tika-s0305t:565_2: evaṃ hetudāharaṇehi yathādhigatamatthaṃ sampādetvā dhammaṃ kathessanti.
tika-s0305t:565_5: Ettha ca “paññapessantī”tiādīhi chahi padehi cha atthapadāni dassitāni,
tika-s0305t:565_6: ādito pana dvīhi padehi cha byañjanapadāni.
tika-s0305t:565_7: Ettāvatā tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ saṃvaṇṇanānayena saṅgahetvā dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0305t:567_0: Satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvāti ayaṃ kāyādivibhāgo attabhāvasaññito dukkhabhāro mayā ettakaṃ kālaṃ vahito,
tika-s0305t:567_2: etassa avahanatthaṃ cirataraṃ kālaṃ ariyamaggasambhāro sambhato,
tika-s0305t:567_4: yato ime kāyādayo asubhādito sabhāvādito sammadeva pariññātāti catubbidhampi satiṃ yathātathaṃ visaye suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitaṃ katvā.
tika-s0305t:567_5: Ñāṇena paricchinditvāti yasmā imassa attabhāvasaññitassa dukkhabhārassa vahane payojanabhūtaṃ attahitaṃ bodhimūle eva parisamāpitaṃ,
tika-s0305t:567_9: evaṃ buddhañāṇena paricchinditvā saccabhāgena vinicchayaṃ katvā.
tika-s0305t:567_10: Āyusaṅkhāraṃ vissajīti āyuno jīvitassa abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ phalasamāpattidhammaṃ na samāpajjissāmīti vissaji,
tika-s0305t:567_11: taṃ vissajjaneneva tena abhisaṅkharīyamānaṃ jīvitasaṅkhāraṃ na pavattayissāmīti vissaji.
tika-s0305t:568_3: sā pana jātikhettabhūtā dasasahassī lokadhātu eva,
tika-s0305t:568_6: tadāpi tattakāya eva kampane kiṃ kāraṇaṃ?
tika-s0305t:568_9: Tathā hi purimabuddhānampi tattakameva jātikhettaṃ ahosi.
tika-s0305t:568_10: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “dasasahassī lokadhātu nissaddā hoti nirākulā…pe…
tika-s0305t:568_17: na cettha kāci bherī devadundubhīti adhippetā,
tika-s0305t:568_18: atha kho uppātabhāvena labbhamāno ākāsato nigghosasaddo.
tika-s0305t:568_21: Tassa hi tadā acchabhāvena ākāsassa vassābhāvena sukkhagajjitasaññite sadde niccharante devadundubhisamaññā.
tika-s0305t:569_0: Pītivegavissaṭṭhanti “evaṃ ciratarakālaṃ vahito ayaṃ attabhāvasaññito dukkhabhāro,
tika-s0305t:569_1: dāni na cirasseva nikkhipissāmī”ti sañjātasomanasso bhagavā sabhāveneva pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ udānaṃ udāneti,
tika-s0305t:569_2: evaṃ udānentena ayampi attho sādhito hotīti dassanatthaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:570_3: Tathā hi taṃ paṭipakkhena parito khaṇḍitabhāvena parittanti vuccati.
tika-s0305t:570_4: Paṭipakkhavikkhambhanato dīghasantānatāya vipulaphalatāya ca na tulaṃ na paricchinnaṃ.
tika-s0305t:570_5: Yehi kāraṇehi pubbe avisesato “mahaggataṃ atula”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0305t:570_6: tāni kāraṇāni rūpāvacarato āruppassa sātisayaṃ vijjantīti arūpāvacaraṃ atulanti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0305t:570_8: Appavipākanti tīsupi kammesu yaṃ appavipākaṃ hīnaṃ,
tika-s0305t:570_13: taṃ hīnaṃ ukkaṭṭhanti dvidhā bhinditvā dvīsu bhāgesu pakkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:570_14: Hīnattikavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva appabahuvipākataṃ niddhāretvā tassa vasena tulātulabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0305t:570_16: Niyakajjhattaratoti sasantānadhammesu vipassanāvasena gocarāsevanāya ca rato.
tika-s0305t:570_18: na ca taṃ kāmādi^ bhavābhisaṅkhārakanti tato visesanatthaṃ sambhavanti vatvā “bhavasaṅkhāra”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:570_20: Kavacaṃ viya attabhāvaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ attani sambhūtattā attasambhavaṃ kilesañca abhindīti kilesabhedasahabhāvikammossajjanaṃ
tika-s0305t:571_4: Tulento tīrentotiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “pañcakkhandhā”tiādiṃ vatvā bhavasaṅkhārassa avasajjanākāraṃ sarūpato dasseti.
tika-s0305t:571_5: Evantiādinā pana udānagāthāvaṇṇanāyaṃ ādito vuttamatthaṃ nigamanavasena dasseti.
tika-s0305t:575_1: Parato imasmiṃ pāsādakampanavagge dasamasutte āvi bhavissanti.
tika-s0305t:575_4: tathā dutiyatatiyasuttesupi ca chaabhiññāpādakā iddhipādā kathitāti attho.
tika-s0305t:577_4: na vinā taṃ chandaṃ nissāyāti āha –
tika-s0305t:577_12: ayaṃ vuccati chandasamādhī”ti imāya pāḷiyā chandādhipati samādhi chandasamādhīti adhipatisaddalopaṃ katvā samāso vuttoti viññāyati,
tika-s0305t:577_15: Tena “chandasamādhinā ceva padhānasaṅkhārehi padhānabhūtasaṅkhārehi ca samannāgatā”ti vakkhati,
tika-s0305t:577_20: Atha vā taṃ taṃ visesaṃ saṅkharotīti saṅkhāro,
tika-s0305t:577_23: Yathā chando chandasamādhinā ceva padhānasaṅkhārehi ca samannāgato,
tika-s0305t:577_24: evaṃ chandasamādhi chandena ceva padhānasaṅkhārehi ca samannāgato.
tika-s0305t:577_25: Padhānasaṅkhārāpi chandena ceva chandasamādhinā ca samannāgatāti tīsupi padesu samannāgatasaddo yojetabbo.
tika-s0305t:577_27: tasmā sabbe te dhammā ekato katvā “ayaṃ vuccati…pe…
tika-s0305t:577_30: vibhaṅge pana tesaṃ iddhibhāvo sampayuttānaṃ iddhipādabhāvo vuttoti dassento “iddhipādavibhaṅge panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t:578_1: Tattha chandañhi bhāvayato padhānaṃ katvā bhāventassa tathā pavattapubbābhisaṅkhāravasena ijjhamāno chando iddhi nāma,
tika-s0305t:579_6: Dveyeva hi sabbattha samannāgamaṅgāni samādhi padhānasaṅkhāro ca,
tika-s0305t:579_9: na chandādīhīti na idha vīriyādhipatitā padhānasaṅkhārassa vuttā hoti.
tika-s0305t:579_10: Vīriyañca samādhiṃ visesetvā ṭhitameva samannāgamaṅgavasena padhānasaṅkhāravacanena vuttanti nāpi dvīhi vīriyehi samannāgamo vutto hoti.
tika-s0305t:579_12: tathāpi visiṭṭheneva ca tena sampayutto padhānasaṅkhāro sesadhammā ca,
tika-s0305t:579_13: tasmā samādhivisesanānaṃ vasena cattāro iddhipādā vuttā,
tika-s0305t:579_16: sadde upādāyaṭṭhena chandādīnaṃ iddhipādatā vuttā hoti,
tika-s0305t:579_17: teneva abhidhamme uttaracūḷabhājaniye “cattāro iddhipādā chandiddhipādo”tiādinā chandādīnaṃyeva iddhipādatā vuttā,
tika-s0305t:579_19: “cattāro iddhipādā idha bhikkhu chandasamādhī”tiādināva uddesaṃ katvāpi puna chandādīnaṃyeva kusalādibhāvo vibhatto.
tika-s0305t:579_21: aññathā catubbidhatā na hotīti ayamettha pāḷivasena atthavinicchayo.
tika-s0305t:579_22: Tattha upāyiddhipādadassanatthamevāti chandādike dhure jeṭṭhake pubbaṅgame katvā nibbattitasamādhi chandādhipatisamādhīti
tika-s0305t:579_25: viññāṇakkhandho”ti tattha tattha pāḷiyaṃ nissayiddhipādadassanaṃ kataṃ chandādivisiṭṭhānaṃyeva vedanākkhandhādīnaṃ adhippetattā.
tika-s0305t:579_27: aññathā kevalaṃ iddhisampayuttānaṃyeva khandhānaṃ vasena iddhipādabhāve gayhamāne tesaṃ catubbidhatā na hoti visesakāraṇabhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0305t:581_0: Raṭṭhapālatthero chande sati kathaṃ nānujānissantīti sattāhāni bhattāni abhuñjitvā mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā
tika-s0305t:581_1: pabbajitvā chandameva nissāya arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti āha –
tika-s0305t:581_4: So hi āyasmā attano sukhumālabhāvaṃ acintetvā ativelaṃ caṅkamanena pādesu uṭṭhitesupi ussāhaṃ avissajjento
tika-s0305t:581_7: mayhaṃ ijjheyyāti cittaṃ dhuraṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattesi.
tika-s0305t:581_9: mayhaṃ ijjheyyā”ti paññāpubbaṅgamaṃ paññādhuraṃ paññājeṭṭhakaṃ katvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti āha “mogharājā
tika-s0305t:581_11: Idāni nesaṃ ariyānaṃ upaṭṭhānussāhamantajātisampadaṃ nissāya rañño santike laddhavisese amaccaputte nidassanabhāvena dassetuṃ “tattha yathā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t:581_12: Ettha ca punappunaṃ chanduppādanaṃ tosanaṃ viya hotīti chandassa upaṭṭhānasadisatā vuttā,
tika-s0305t:581_16: sambhūtesu kusaladhammesu paññā seṭṭhāti vīmaṃsāya jātisampattisadisatā vuttā.
tika-s0305t:583_12: Paṭipattidhamme pamuṭṭhā vinaṭṭhā paṭivinaṭṭhā sati etesanti muṭṭhasatīti āha –
tika-s0305t:583_14: Ubbhantacittāti samādhino abhāvena uddhacceneva uparūpari bhantacittā.
tika-s0305t:590_2: tassa uppādanākāraṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “so buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇe āvajjetvā”tiādi.
tika-s0305t:590_3: Vatthukāme ārabbha vikkhitto punappunaṃ vikkhitto hotiyevāti vuttaṃ “anuvikkhitto”ti.
tika-s0305t:590_4: Uppathaṃ paṭipannassa cittassa daṇḍanaṭṭhena niggaṇhanaṭṭhena suttāni eva daṇḍoti suttadaṇḍo,
tika-s0305t:590_6: Pañcakāmaguṇe ārabbha pavatto cittavikkhepo punappunaṃ uppajjatevāti vuttaṃ “anuvikkhitto anuvisaṭo”ti.
tika-s0305t:591_0: Purepacchābhāvo kammaṭṭhānassa manasikāravasena uggahavasena vāti tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ “katha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:591_6: Bahiddhā visamavitakkānubhāvanaṃ āpajjanto dvattiṃsākāravasena aṭṭhikasaññāvasena vā gahetabbanti āha –
tika-s0305t:592_0: Aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarato ākirīyanti pakārato ṭhapīyantīti ākārā,
tika-s0305t:592_11: Vīriyādīsupīti yathā “idha bhikkhu chandaṃ uppādetvā”ti chande vitthāranayo vutto,
tika-s0305t:596_1: Iminā catumahābhūtamayenāti iminā sabbalokapaccakkhena catūhi mahābhūtehi nibbattena catumahābhūtamayena.
tika-s0305t:596_2: Manomayo pana nimmitakāyo bhagavato rucivasena paresaṃ paccakkho hoti.
tika-s0305t:596_5: saddo sattiatthopi hotīti “pahoti sakkotī”ti attho vutto.
tika-s0305t:596_7: Kāyassa citte samodahanaṃ āropanaṃ tannissitatākaraṇañca atthato cittagatiyā pavattanamevāti āha “cittagatiyā pesetī”ti.
tika-s0305t:597_0: Tattha cittagatigamanaṃ nāma cittavasena kāyassa pariṇāmanena “ayaṃ kāyo imaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū”ti kāyassa cittena samānagatikatāṭhapanaṃ.
tika-s0305t:597_1: Kathaṃ pana kāyo dandhapavattiko lahupavattinā cittena samānagatiko hotīti?
tika-s0305t:597_3: Yatheva hi kāyavasena cittapariṇāmane cittaṃ sabbathā kāyena samānagatikaṃ na hoti.
tika-s0305t:597_4: Na hi kadāci taṃ sabhāvasiddhena attano khaṇena avattitvā dandhavuttikassa rūpadhammassa vasena pavattituṃ sakkoti,
tika-s0305t:597_5: “idaṃ cittaṃ ayaṃ kāyo viya hotū”ti pana adhiṭṭhānena dandhagatikassa kāyassa anuvattanato yāva icchitaṭṭhānappatti,
tika-s0305t:597_6: tāva kāyagatianulomeneva hutvā santānavasena pavattamānaṃ cittaṃ kāyagatiyā pariṇāmitaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-s0305t:597_7: Evaṃ “ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū”ti adhiṭṭhānena pageva sukhalahusaññāya sampāditattā abhāvitiddhipādānaṃ
tika-s0305t:597_8: viya dandhaṃ avattitvā yathā lahukaṃ katipayacittavāreneva icchitaṭṭhānappatti hoti,
tika-s0305t:597_9: evaṃ pavattamāno kāyo cittagatiyā pariṇāmito nāma hoti,
tika-s0305t:597_11: evañca katvā bāhāsamiñjanapasāraṇūpamāpi upacārena vinā suṭṭhutaraṃ yuttā hotīti.
tika-s0305t:597_13: nāpi dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇaññathattaṃ iddhibalena kātuṃ sakkā,
tika-s0305t:599_1: “Dvinnaṃ phalāna”nti āgatasuttaṃ sandhāya “dve phalāni ādiṃ katvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:605_1: Chattiṃsāya ṭhānesūti ajjhattaṃ kāye samudayadhammānupassī, vayo,
tika-s0305t:605_7: tathā vedanāya citte dhammesūti evaṃ chattiṃsāya ṭhānesu.
tika-s0305t:605_8: Dutiye dvādasasu ṭhānesūti kāye ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā ajjhattabahiddhā,
tika-s0305t:605_9: vedanāya citte dhammesūti evaṃ dvādasasu ṭhānesu.
tika-s0305t:607_3: Ime dhammā majjhimā hīnapaṇītānaṃ majjhe bhavāti.
tika-s0305t:609_6: Dasacakkavāḷasahassaṃ ekāvajjanassa āpāthaṃ āgacchati tathā ālokavaḍḍhanassa katattā.
tika-s0305t:614_3: Sāvakānampi attano abhinīhārānurūpaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti te kālapadesavasena ceva yathāparicayasattapadesavasena ca ṭhānānīti jānanti,
tika-s0305t:614_4: sammāsambuddhānaṃ pana anantañāṇatāya sabbattheva appaṭihatameva ñāṇanti āha –
tika-s0305t:614_6: Etaṃ dasabalañāṇaṃ anantavisayattā nippadesaṃ anūnatāya sabbākāraparipūraṃ.
tika-s0305t:623_0: 977. Etthāti etasmiṃ paṭhamasutte. Vuttameva, tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0305t:625_2: tasmā nūti iminā samānatthoti āha “bhāvetha nū”ti.
tika-s0305t:625_5: Iminā kāmacchandappahānakittanena paṭighasaññāpaṭivinayakittanena ca anāgāmimaggaṃ katheti pañcorambhāgiyasaññojanasamucchedassa byākatattā.
tika-s0305t:627_1: “Neva kāyopi kilamati na cakkhūnī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ paduddhāro kato.
tika-s0305t:627_3: cakkhūnipi vihaññantī”ti vatvā yattha yathā hoti,
tika-s0305t:627_5: Cakkhūni phandanti kilamantītiādi ativelaṃ upanijjhāyane hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:628_2: Na hi tārakarūpamuttāvaḷikādisadisaṃ nimittūpaṭṭhānākāramattaṃ khaṇamattaṭṭhāyinaṃ kasiṇanimittesu viya ugghāṭanaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti.
tika-s0305t:628_5: ānāpānassatisamādhismiṃ siddhe ayaṃ guṇo sukheneva ijjhatīti.
tika-s0305t:628_6: Yasmā bhikkhūti imasmiṃ vāre nāgatanti yathā purimavāre “bhikkhu cepi ākaṅkheyyā”ti āgataṃ,
tika-s0305t:630_4: Anekapariyāyenāti ettha pariyāyasaddo kāraṇavacanoti āha “anekehi kāraṇehī”ti,
tika-s0305t:630_5: ayaṃ kāyo aviññāṇakopi saviññāṇakopi evampi asubho evampi asubhoti nānāvidhehi kāraṇehīti attho.
tika-s0305t:630_6: Asubhākārasandassanappavattanti kesādivasena tatthāpi vaṇṇādito asubhākārassa sabbaso dassanavasena pavattaṃ.
tika-s0305t:630_7: Kāyavicchandanīyakathanti attano parassa ca karajakāye vicchandanuppādanakathaṃ.
tika-s0305t:630_8: Muttaṃ vātiādinā byatirekamukhena kāyassa amanuññataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0305t:630_9: Tattha ādito tīhi padehi adassanīyatāya asārakatāya ca,
tika-s0305t:630_12: Atha khotiādinā anvayato sarūpeneva amanuññatāya dassanaṃ.
tika-s0305t:632_0: Apare pana “tasmiṃ kira addhamāse na koci buddhaveneyyo ahosi,
tika-s0305t:633_0: Anekakāraṇasammissoti ettha kāraṇaṃ nāma kāyassa asuciduggandhajegucchapaṭikūlatāva.
tika-s0305t:633_1: Sabbamakaṃsūti puthujjanā nāma sāvajjepi tattha anavajjasaññino hutvā karaṇakārāpanasamanuññatābhedaṃ sabbaṃ pāpaṃ akaṃsu.
tika-s0305t:633_3: sā pana tattha sannipatitabhikkhūsu bahūnaṃ sappāyā sātthikā ca,
tika-s0305t:633_5: Tathā hi bhagavā tameva kammaṭṭhānaṃ imasmiṃ sutte kathesi.
tika-s0305t:633_7: cattāro pana āruppā ādikammikānaṃ ayogyāti tesaṃ idha aggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:634_1: Muhuttenevāti satthari saddhamme ca gāravena upagatabhikkhūnaṃ vacanasamanantarameva uṭṭhahiṃsūti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:634_2: Buddhakāle kira bhikkhū bhagavato sandesaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchituṃ ohitasotā viharanti.
tika-s0305t:635_1: Sampayutto samādhīti tāya sampayuttaaññamaññapaccayabhūtāya uppanno samādhi.
tika-s0305t:635_2: Ānāpānassatiyaṃ vā samādhīti iminā upanissayapaccayasabhāvampi dasseti,
tika-s0305t:635_3: ubhayatthāpi sahajātādīnaṃ sattannampi paccayānaṃ vasena paccayabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0305t:635_4: “Yathāpaṭipannā me sāvakā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāventī”tiādīsu uppādanavaḍḍhanaṭṭhena bhāvanāti vuccatīti
tika-s0305t:635_5: tadubhayavasena atthaṃ dassento “bhāvitoti uppādito vaḍḍhito vā”ti āha.
tika-s0305t:635_6: Tattha bhāvaṃ vijjamānataṃ ito gatoti bhāvito,
tika-s0305t:635_17: vivicceva kāmehī”ti ca evamādīsu paṭhamapade vutto eva-
tika-s0305t:635_20: Ubhayattha niyamena laddhaguṇaṃ dassetuṃ “ayaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:636_1: Tañhi asubhesu yogakammabhāvato yogino sukhavisesānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato ca “asubhakammaṭṭhāna”nti vuccati.
tika-s0305t:636_4: Jhānañhi bhāvanāvisesena ijjhantaṃ attano visayaṃ paṭivijjhantameva pavattati yathāsabhāvato paṭivijjhiyati cāti paṭivedhoti vuccati.
tika-s0305t:636_9: Ārammaṇasantatāyāti anukkamena vicitabbataṃ pattārammaṇassa paramasukhumataṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0305t:636_10: Santehi sannisinne ārammaṇe pavattamāno dhammo sayampi sannisinnova hoti.
tika-s0305t:636_13: Ārammaṇasantatāya tadārammaṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ santatā lokuttaradhammārammaṇāhi paccavekkhaṇāhi veditabbā.
tika-s0305t:637_6: Sabbametaṃ sarasato eva santabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0305t:637_10: Tadā hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ nirassādattā asantaṃ appaṇītaṃ siyā.
tika-s0305t:637_11: Upacāre vā natthi ettha santatāti yojanā.
tika-s0305t:637_12: Yathā upacārakkhaṇe nīvaraṇādivigamena aṅgapātubhāvena ca paresaṃ santatā hoti,
tika-s0305t:637_21: upekkhāya vā santabhāvena sukhagatikattā sabbesampi jhānānaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:637_24: Imasmiṃ pakkhe “appitappitakkhaṇe”ti idaṃ hetumhi bhummavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:638_6: taṃ pana jhānakattukaṃ idhādhippetanti pariyuṭṭhānappahānaṃ hotīti āha –
tika-s0305t:638_9: Visesena upasamanaṃ pana sammadeva upasamanaṃ hotīti āha “suṭṭhu upasametī”ti.
tika-s0305t:638_10: Sāsanikassa jhānabhāvanā yebhuyyena nibbedhabhāgiyā hotīti āha “nibbedhabhāgiyattā”ti.
tika-s0305t:638_11: Ariyamaggassa pādakabhūto ayaṃ samādhi anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā ariyamaggabhāvaṃ upagato viya hotīti āha “anupubbena ariyamaggavuḍḍhippatto”ti.
tika-s0305t:638_12: Ayaṃ panattho virāganirodhapaṭinissaggānupassanānaṃ vasena sammadeva yujjati.
tika-s0305t:640_2: Ayaṃ desanāti “kathaṃ vibhāvito nu kho kimilā”tiādinā pavattā desanā.
tika-s0305t:640_4: Evanti yathā ānāpānaṃ anussaranto bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī jāto,
tika-s0305t:640_5: evaṃ sabbattha vāresu vedanānupassītiādi attho veditabbo.
tika-s0305t:641_1: Manasikārapadesena vedanā vuttāti taṃ sabbaṃ sarūpato aññāpadesato apadisati.
tika-s0305t:642_0: Evaṃ santepīti pītimanasikāracittasaṅkhārapadesena yadi vedanā vuttā,
tika-s0305t:642_2: Esā yathāvuttā vedanā ārammaṇaṃ na hoti.
tika-s0305t:642_8: Tattha sukhādīnaṃ vatthunti sukhādīnaṃ uppattiyā vatthubhūtaṃ rūpasaddādiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanā vediyati,
tika-s0305t:642_10: Vedanāppavattiṃ upādāya nissāya yathā “puggalo vedanaṃ vediyatī”ti vohāramattaṃ hoti.
tika-s0305t:642_11: Evaṃ idhāpi vedanāya assāsapassāse ārabbha pavatti,
tika-s0305t:642_12: tathā pavattamanasikārasīsena “vedanāsu vedanānupassī bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharatī”ti vutto.
tika-s0305t:642_13: Taṃ sandhāyāti taṃ vedanāya ārammaṇabhāvaṃ sandhāya.
tika-s0305t:643_0: Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjatīti pītisahagatāni paṭhamadutiyajjhānāni paṭipāṭiyā samāpajjati.
tika-s0305t:643_5: Ārammaṇatoti ārammaṇamukhena tadārammaṇajhānapariyāpannā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti,
tika-s0305t:643_7: Yathā nāma sappapariyesanaṃ carantena tassa āsaye paṭisaṃvidite sopi paṭisaṃvidito hoti mantāgadabalena tassa gahaṇassa sukarattā,
tika-s0305t:643_8: evaṃ pītiyā āsayabhūte ārammaṇe paṭisaṃvidite sā pīti paṭisaṃviditāva hoti salakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca tassā gahaṇassa sukarattā.
tika-s0305t:643_10: Lakkhaṇappaṭivedhenāti pītiyā salakkhaṇassa sāmaññalakkhaṇassa ca paṭivijjhanena.
tika-s0305t:643_11: Yañhi pītiyā visesato sāmaññato ca lakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-s0305t:643_12: tasmiṃ vidite sā yāthāvato viditā eva hoti.
tika-s0305t:644_1: Tattha dīghaṃ assāsavasenāti dīghassa assāsassa ārammaṇabhūtassa vasena.
tika-s0305t:644_2: Pajānato sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti sambandho.
tika-s0305t:644_3: Cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānatoti jhānapariyāpannaṃ “avikkhepo”ti laddhanāmaṃ cittassekaggataṃ taṃsampayuttāya paññāya pajānato.
tika-s0305t:644_4: Yathā hi ārammaṇamukhena pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti,
tika-s0305t:644_5: evaṃ taṃsampayuttadhammāpi ārammaṇamukhena paṭisaṃviditā eva hontīti.
tika-s0305t:644_6: Sati upaṭṭhitā hotīti dīghaṃ assāsavasena jhānasampayuttā sati tasmiṃ ārammaṇe upaṭṭhitā ārammaṇamukhena jhānepi upaṭṭhitā nāma hoti.
tika-s0305t:644_7: Tāya satiyāti evaṃ upaṭṭhitāya tāya satiyā yathāvuttena tena ñāṇena suppaṭividitattā ārammaṇassa tassa vasena tadārammaṇā sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti.
tika-s0305t:644_8: Dīghaṃ passāsavasenātiādīsupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0305t:644_9: Tena vuttaṃ “eteneva nayena avasesapadānipi atthato veditabbānī”ti.
tika-s0305t:645_1: jhānapaṭilābhena yathā ārammaṇato pītiādayo paṭisaṃviditā honti tena vinā tesaṃ appavattanato.
tika-s0305t:645_2: Evaṃ jhānasampayuttena taṃpariyāpannena vedanāsaṅkhātamanasikārapaṭilābhena ārammaṇato vedanā paṭisaṃviditā
tika-s0305t:645_3: hoti aruṇuggamena viya sūriyassa tena vinā vedanāya appavattanato.
tika-s0305t:646_1: Cittānupassīyeva nāmesa hoti asammohato cittassa paṭisaṃviditattā.
tika-s0305t:647_2: Paññāyāti aparāya vipassanāpaññāya aniccavirāgādito disvā duvidhāyapi ajjhupekkhitā hoti.
tika-s0305t:647_8: Pathapaṭipannaṃ ajjhupekkhatīti majjhimāya paṭipattiyā sammadeva vīthipaṭipannaṃ bhāvanācittaṃ paggahaniggahānaṃ akaraṇena ajjhupekkhati.
tika-s0305t:647_9: Ekato upaṭṭhānanti yasmā majjhimasamathavīthinātivattiyā tattha ca pakkhandanena indriyānaṃ ekarasabhāvena,
tika-s0305t:647_10: tatramajjhattatāya bhāvato avisesaṃ ekaggabhāvūpagamanena ekantato upaṭṭhāti,
tika-s0305t:647_11: tasmā na tattha kiñci kātabbanti ajjhupekkhati.
tika-s0305t:647_13: Sahajātānampi ajjhupekkhanā hoti tesaṃ pavattanākārassa ajjhupekkhanato.
tika-s0305t:648_0: Paṃsupuñjaṭṭhāniyassa kilesassa uppattiṭṭhānadassanatthaṃ “catumahāpatho viya cha āyatanāni”icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:648_2: Catūsu ārammaṇesūti kāyādīsu catūsu ārammaṇesu pavattā cattāro satipaṭṭhānā paṃsupuñjaṭṭhāniyassa kilesassa upahananato.
tika-s0305t:653_1: vākāroti eva- kāro vā- kāro ca.
tika-s0305t:653_3: Sekkhavacaneneva tesaṃ sikkhitabbassa atthibhāve siddhepi sikkhitabbarahitesu tesupi sekkhapariyāyassa
tika-s0305t:653_5: Āsavakkhayatthaṃ sikkhitabbassa abhāvepi diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ jhānādisikkhanena vinā sikkhitabbābhāvā “asekkhā nāmā”ti vuttā.
tika-s0305t:653_6: Buddhānaṃ pana sabbaso sammadeva pariniṭṭhitasikkhattā “sikkhāmī”ti na vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:657_1: Ānāpānasannissayena pavattattā ārammaṇavasena pavattā ānāpānārammaṇāpi aparabhāge sati ānāpānassatīti
tika-s0305t:657_2: pariyāyena vattabbataṃ arahatīti “ānāpānassati missakā kathitā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:657_6: Tepi bojjhaṅgāti ete vīsati satipaṭṭhānahetukā bojjhaṅgā.
tika-s0305t:657_7: Vijjāvimuttipūrakāti tatiyavijjāya tassa phalassa ca paripūraṇavasena pavattā bojjhaṅgā.
tika-s0305t:664_0: Aveccappasādenāti vatthuttayassa guṇe yāthāvato avecca pavisitvā pasādo.
tika-s0305t:664_5: Ariyasāvakānañhi ariyamaggo uppajjantova tīsu vatthūsu aveccappasādaṃ āvahanto eva uppajjati.
tika-s0305t:664_6: Tesanti visayabhūtānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vatthūnaṃ vasena tidhā vutto.
tika-s0305t:665_7: Ekantaraṃ bhinnanti abhinnena ekantaraṃ hutvā bhinnaṃ.
tika-s0305t:667_4: Ariyakantāni sīlāni gahitāni sotāpannassa sīlānaṃ adhippetattā.
tika-s0305t:667_5: Saṅghe pasādo gahito dhammappasādassa anantaraṃ vuccamānattā.
tika-s0305t:667_15: Missakappasādo esoti tasmā ubhopi therā paṇḍitā bahussutā.

tika-s0305t:832_9: Tassa pana “kāle paṭiggahita”nti vuttattā paṭiggahaṇaṃ vaṭṭatīti āha –
tika-s0305t:832_12: tasmā samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya vuttanayenettha vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-s0305t:835_3: Tattha tatthāti gāmantare santike ca gamanaṃ dūtakammanti vuccatīti yojanā.
tika-s0305t:837_9: Dadanto pubbabhāgeti paresaṃ dadanto pubbabhāge hatthena tulaṃ akkamati.
tika-s0305t:838_3: Nimiyamānassa tilataṇḍulādikassa sikhāya aggakoṭiyā bhinnaṃ sikhābhedo.
tika-s0305t:838_5: Rajjugahaṇeneva cettha daṇḍakassa gahaṇaṃ katamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:840_6: taṃ pana pothanaṃ sandhāyāti sakkā viññātuṃ māraṇasaddassa vihiṃsanepi dissanato.
tika-s0305t:845_1: samathavipassanāsu sammadeva yatanato ca yatīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ khandhāyatanadhātusaccindriyapaṭiccasamuppādabhede
tika-s0305t:845_2: paramatthadhamme nānānayehi ñāṇavibhāgassa sannissayena bahukārassa saṃyuttāgamavarassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ
tika-s0305t:845_3: kātuṃ sāratthappakāsanato eva nipuṇā yā mayā aṭṭhakathā āraddhāti sambandho.
tika-s0305t:845_4: Savisesaṃ paññāvahaguṇattā eva hissa ganthārambhe āditopi “paññāpabhedajananassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:846_0: Mūlaṭṭhakathāya sāranti pubbe vuttasaṃyuttamahāaṭṭhakathāya sārameva puna nigamanavasena vuttanti.
tika-s0305t:846_1: Atha vā mūlaṭṭhakathāya sāranti porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu atthasāraṃ.
tika-s0305t:846_2: Tena etaṃ dasseti “saṃyuttamahāaṭṭhakathāya atthasāraṃ ādāya imaṃ sāratthappakāsiniṃ karontena sesamahānikāyānampi
tika-s0305t:846_3: mūlaṭṭhakathāsu idha viyogakkhamaṃ atthasāraṃ ādāya akāsi”nti.
tika-s0305t:846_4: “Mahāvihārādhivāsīna”nti ca idaṃ purimapacchimapadehi saddhiṃ sambandhitabbaṃ “mahāvihārādhivāsīnaṃ samayaṃ
tika-s0305t:846_5: pakāsayantiṃ mahāvihārādhivāsīnaṃ mūlaṭṭhakathāya sāraṃ ādāyā”ti ca.
tika-s0305t:846_7: Hotu sabbo sukhī lokoti kāmāvacarādivibhāgo sabbo sattaloko yathārahaṃ bodhittayādhigamavasena sampayuttena
tika-s0305t:846_8: nibbānasukhena sukhito hotūti sadevakassa lokassa accantaṃ sukhādhigamāya attano puññaṃ pariṇāmeti.
